translated_passage: አብ ልዕሊ ጉንበት ,4 ,2008 Beyoncé ምርዕው Jay .Z እሳ publicly ዝተቓልዐ ናቶም መርዓ አብ ውሽጢ ሓደ ቪዲዮ montage ኣብ እቲ ምድማፅ ጓይላ ን ንሳ ሳልሳይ studio ,album ኣነ ...እየ Sasha ,ጨካን አብ ውሽጢ 'Manhattan's Sony Club አብ ልዕሊ ጥቅምቲ ,22 .2008 ኣነ ...እየ Sasha ጨካን ኔሩ ተለቒቑ አብ ልዕሊ ሕዳር ,18 2008 አብ ውሽጢ እቲ United .States እቲ album formally introduces 'Beyoncé's alter ስሰዐ Sasha ,ጨካን conceived አብ እዋን እቲ making ካብ ንሳ 2003single 'ዕቡድ አብ ውሽጢ ',ፍቅሪ selling ,482,000 copies አብ ውሽጢ ናቱ መጀመርታ ,ሰሙን debuting atop እቲ Billboard ,200 እና giving Beyoncé ንሳ ሳልሳይ consecutive -number-one album አብ ውሽጢ እቲ .ንሕና እቲ album featured እቲ -number-one ደርፊ 'ነፀላ Ladies (አቅምጥ ሓደ ቀለበት አብ ልዕሊ )'እቲ ነገር እና እቲ -top-five songs 'እንተ ኣነ ኔሮም ሓደ 'ወዲ እና ''.Halo Achieving እቲ accomplishment ካብ becoming ንሳ -longest-running ምዉቅ 100 ነፀላ አብ ውሽጢ ንሳ ,ሞያ ''Halo's ዓወት አብ ውሽጢ እቲ ንሕና helped Beyoncé attain ቡዙሕ -top-ten singles አብ ልዕሊ እቲ ዝርዝር ካብ ዝኾነ ካልእ ሰበይቲ አብ እዋን እቲ .2000s እቲ ነገር እውን included እቲ ዕውት 'ጥዑም ',Dreams እና singles '',Diva '',ስሰዐ '-Broken-Hearted 'ጓል እና 'ቪዲዮ '.ስልኪ እቲ ሙዚቃ ቪዲዮ ን 'ነፀላ 'Ladies ኣለዎ ዝነበረ parodied እና imitated አብ ከባቢ እቲ ,ዓለም spawning እቲ 'መጀመርታ ዋና ሳዕስዒት 'craze ካብ እቲ Internet ዕድመ ከም ናብ እቲ Toronto .ኮኾብ እቲ ቪዲዮ ኣለዎ ተዓወተ ቡዙሓት ,awards ይሓውስ ምሩፅ ቪዲዮ ኣብ እቲ 2009 MTV Europe ሙዚቃ ,Awards እቲ 2009 Scottish MOBO ,Awards እና እቲ 2009 BET .Awards ኣብ እቲ 2009 MTV ቪዲዮ ሙዚቃ ,Awards እቲ ቪዲዮ ኔሩ nominated ን ትሸዓተ ,awards ultimately winning ሰለስተ ይሓውስ ቪዲዮ ካብ እቲ .ዓመት ናቱ ውድቀት ናብ ዓወት እቲ ምሩፅ ኣንስተይቲ ቪዲዮ ,ምደባ አየናይ ኬዱ ናብ American ሃገር ኣቦ ደራፊ Taylor 'Swift's 'ንስኻ ናሃቱ ምስ ',ኣነ መረሐ ናብ Kanye ምዕራብ interrupting እቲ ኣከባብራ እና Beyoncé improvising ሓደ -re-presentation ካብ 'Swift's ሽልማት አብ እዋን ንሳ ወንን acceptance .ዘረባ አብ ውሽጢ መጋቢት ,2009 Beyoncé embarked አብ ልዕሊ እቲ ኣነ ...እየ ዓለም ,ዙር ንሳ ካልኣይ headlining worldwide ምርኢት ,ዙር consisting ካብ 108 ,shows grossing $.119.5 .ሚልዮን
translated_question: ከመይ ቡዙሕ shows ኔሮም performed አብ እዋን እቲ ኣነ ...እየ ዓለም ?ዙር

passage: On April 4, 2008, Beyoncé married Jay Z. She publicly revealed their marriage in a video montage at the listening party for her third studio album, I Am... Sasha Fierce, in Manhattan's Sony Club on October 22, 2008. I Am... Sasha Fierce was released on November 18, 2008 in the United States. The album formally introduces Beyoncé's alter ego Sasha Fierce, conceived during the making of her 2003single 'Crazy in Love', selling 482,000 copies in its first week, debuting atop the Billboard 200, and giving Beyoncé her third consecutive number-one album in the US. The album featured the number-one song 'Single Ladies (Put a Ring on It)' and the top-five songs 'If I Were a Boy' and 'Halo'. Achieving the accomplishment of becoming her longest-running Hot 100 single in her career, 'Halo's success in the US helped Beyoncé attain more top-ten singles on the list than any other woman during the 2000s. It also included the successful 'Sweet Dreams', and singles 'Diva', 'Ego', 'Broken-Hearted Girl' and 'Video Phone'. The music video for 'Single Ladies' has been parodied and imitated around the world, spawning the 'first major dance craze' of the Internet age according to the Toronto Star. The video has won several awards, including Best Video at the 2009 MTV Europe Music Awards, the 2009 Scottish MOBO Awards, and the 2009 BET Awards. At the 2009 MTV Video Music Awards, the video was nominated for nine awards, ultimately winning three including Video of the Year. Its failure to win the Best Female Video category, which went to American country pop singer Taylor Swift's 'You Belong with Me', led to Kanye West interrupting the ceremony and Beyoncé improvising a re-presentation of Swift's award during her own acceptance speech. In March 2009, Beyoncé embarked on the I Am... World Tour, her second headlining worldwide concert tour, consisting of 108 shows, grossing $119.5 million.
question: How much gross revenue did the I Am... World Tour generate?

passage: On April 4, 2008, Beyoncé married Jay Z. She publicly revealed their marriage in a video montage at the listening party for her third studio album, I Am... Sasha Fierce, in Manhattan's Sony Club on October 22, 2008. I Am... Sasha Fierce was released on November 18, 2008 in the United States. The album formally introduces Beyoncé's alter ego Sasha Fierce, conceived during the making of her 2003single 'Crazy in Love', selling 482,000 copies in its first week, debuting atop the Billboard 200, and giving Beyoncé her third consecutive number-one album in the US. The album featured the number-one song 'Single Ladies (Put a Ring on It)' and the top-five songs 'If I Were a Boy' and 'Halo'. Achieving the accomplishment of becoming her longest-running Hot 100 single in her career, 'Halo's success in the US helped Beyoncé attain more top-ten singles on the list than any other woman during the 2000s. It also included the successful 'Sweet Dreams', and singles 'Diva', 'Ego', 'Broken-Hearted Girl' and 'Video Phone'. The music video for 'Single Ladies' has been parodied and imitated around the world, spawning the 'first major dance craze' of the Internet age according to the Toronto Star. The video has won several awards, including Best Video at the 2009 MTV Europe Music Awards, the 2009 Scottish MOBO Awards, and the 2009 BET Awards. At the 2009 MTV Video Music Awards, the video was nominated for nine awards, ultimately winning three including Video of the Year. Its failure to win the Best Female Video category, which went to American country pop singer Taylor Swift's 'You Belong with Me', led to Kanye West interrupting the ceremony and Beyoncé improvising a re-presentation of Swift's award during her own acceptance speech. In March 2009, Beyoncé embarked on the I Am... World Tour, her second headlining worldwide concert tour, consisting of 108 shows, grossing $119.5 million.

passage: Beyoncé further expanded her acting career, starring as blues singer Etta James in the 2008 musical biopic, Cadillac Records. Her performance in the film received praise from critics, and she garnered several nominations for her portrayal of James, including a Satellite Award nomination for Best Supporting Actress, and a NAACP Image Award nomination for Outstanding Supporting Actress. Beyoncé donated her entire salary from the film to Phoenix House, an organization of rehabilitation centers for heroin addicts around the country. On January 20, 2009, Beyoncé performed James' \'At Last\' at the First Couple's first inaugural ball. Beyoncé starred opposite Ali Larter and Idris Elba in the thriller, Obsessed. She played Sharon Charles, a mother and wife who learns of a woman's obsessive behavior over her husband. Although the film received negative reviews from critics, the movie did well at the US box office, grossing $68 million—$60 million more than Cadillac Records—on a budget of $20 million. The fight scene finale between Sharon and the character played by Ali Larter also won the 2010 MTV Movie Award for Best Fight.
question: Which iconic blues singer did Beyoncé portray in Cadillac Records?

passage: Beyoncé further expanded her acting career, starring as blues singer Etta James in the 2008 musical biopic, Cadillac Records. Her performance in the film received praise from critics, and she garnered several nominations for her portrayal of James, including a Satellite Award nomination for Best Supporting Actress, and a NAACP Image Award nomination for Outstanding Supporting Actress. Beyoncé donated her entire salary from the film to Phoenix House, an organization of rehabilitation centers for heroin addicts around the country. On January 20, 2009, Beyoncé performed James' \'At Last\' at the First Couple's first inaugural ball. Beyoncé starred opposite Ali Larter and Idris Elba in the thriller, Obsessed. She played Sharon Charles, a mother and wife who learns of a woman's obsessive behavior over her husband. Although the film received negative reviews from critics, the movie did well at the US box office, grossing $68 million—$60 million more than Cadillac Records—on a budget of $20 million. The fight scene finale between Sharon and the character played by Ali Larter also won the 2010 MTV Movie Award for Best Fight.

passage: Beyoncé further expanded her acting career, starring as blues singer Etta James in the 2008 musical biopic, Cadillac Records. Her performance in the film received praise from critics, and she garnered several nominations for her portrayal of James, including a Satellite Award nomination for Best Supporting Actress, and a NAACP Image Award nomination for Outstanding Supporting Actress. Beyoncé donated her entire salary from the film to Phoenix House, an organization of rehabilitation centers for heroin addicts around the country. On January 20, 2009, Beyoncé performed James' \'At Last\' at the First Couple's first inaugural ball. Beyoncé starred opposite Ali Larter and Idris Elba in the thriller, Obsessed. She played Sharon Charles, a mother and wife who learns of a woman's obsessive behavior over her husband. Although the film received negative reviews from critics, the movie did well at the US box office, grossing $68 million—$60 million more than Cadillac Records—on a budget of $20 million. The fight scene finale between Sharon and the character played by Ali Larter also won the 2010 MTV Movie Award for Best Fight.

passage: Her fourth studio album 4was released on June 28, 2011in the US. 4sold 310,000 copies in its first week and debuted atop the Billboard 200 chart, giving Beyoncé her fourth consecutive number-one album in the US. The album was preceded by two of its singles \'Run the World (Girls)\' and \'Best Thing I Never Had\', which both attained moderate success. The fourth single \'Love on Top\' was a commercial success in the US. 4also produced four other singles; \'Party\', \'Countdown\', \'I Care\' and \'End of Time\'. \'Eat, Play, Love\', a cover story written by Beyoncé for Essence that detailed her 2010 career break, won her a writing award from the New York Association of Black Journalists. In late 2011, she took the stage at New York's Roseland Ballroom for four nights of special performances: the 4Intimate Nights with Beyoncé concerts saw the performance of her 4album to a standing room only.

translated_passage: ንሳ fourth studio album 4was ተለቒቑ አብ ልዕሊ ሰነ ,28 2011in እቲ .ንሕና 4sold ,310,000 copies አብ ውሽጢ ናቱ መጀመርታ ሰሙን እና debuted atop እቲ Billboard 200 ,ካርታ ባሕሪ giving Beyoncé ንሳ fourth consecutive -number-one album አብ ውሽጢ እቲ .ንሕና እቲ album ኔሩ preceded ብ ክልተ ካብ ናቱ singles \'ጉየ እቲ ዓለም ()\'Girls እና \'ምሩፅ ነገር ኣነ ፍፁም \',ዝነበረ አየናይ ክልቲኡ attained ማእኸላይ .ዓወት እቲ fourth ነፀላ \'ፍቅሪ አብ ልዕሊ \'ላዕለዋይ ኔሩ ሓደ ንግዳዊ ዓወት አብ ውሽጢ እቲ .ንሕና 4also produced ዓርባዕተ ካልእ ;singles \'\',ጓይላ \'\',Countdown \'ኣነ \'Care እና \'መወዳእታ ካብ \'.ግዜ \',ብላዕ ,ተፃወት \',ፍቅሪ ሓደ ሽፋን ዛንታ ዝተፀሓፈ ብ Beyoncé ን ንፍዕቲ እቲ detailed ንሳ 2010 ሞያ ,ስበር ተዓወተ ንሳ ሓደ ምጽሓፍ ሽልማት ካብ እቲ ሓድሽ York ማሕበር ካብ ፀሊም .Journalists አብ ውሽጢ ረፋድ ,2011 እሳ ምውሳድ እቲ መድረኽ ኣብ ሓድሽ 'York's Roseland Ballroom ን ዓርባዕተ nights ካብ ፍሉይ :performances እቲ 4Intimate Nights ምስ Beyoncé concerts ሪኤ እቲ ብቅዓት ካብ ንሳ 4album ናብ ሓደ standing ክፍሊ .ጥራሕ

translated_passage: ንሳ fourth studio album 4was ተለቒቑ አብ ልዕሊ ሰነ ,28 2011in እቲ .ንሕና 4sold ,310,000 copies አብ ውሽጢ ናቱ መጀመርታ ሰሙን እና debuted atop እቲ Billboard 200 ,ካርታ ባሕሪ giving Beyoncé ንሳ fourth consecutive -number-one album አብ ውሽጢ እቲ .ንሕና እቲ album ኔሩ preceded ብ ክልተ ካብ ናቱ singles \'ጉየ እቲ ዓለም ()\'Girls እና \'ምሩፅ ነገር ኣነ ፍፁም \',ዝነበረ አየናይ ክልቲኡ attained ማእኸላይ .ዓወት እቲ fourth ነፀላ \'ፍቅሪ አብ ልዕሊ \'ላዕለዋይ ኔሩ ሓደ ንግዳዊ ዓወት አብ ውሽጢ እቲ .ንሕና 4also produced ዓርባዕተ ካልእ ;singles \'\',ጓይላ \'\',Countdown \'ኣነ \'Care እና \'መወዳእታ ካብ \'.ግዜ \',ብላዕ ,ተፃወት \',ፍቅሪ ሓደ ሽፋን ዛንታ ዝተፀሓፈ ብ Beyoncé ን ንፍዕቲ እቲ detailed ንሳ 2010 ሞያ ,ስበር ተዓወተ ንሳ ሓደ ምጽሓፍ ሽልማት ካብ እቲ ሓድሽ York ማሕበር ካብ ፀሊም .Journalists አብ ውሽጢ ረፋድ ,2011 እሳ ምውሳድ እቲ መድረኽ ኣብ ሓድሽ 'York's Roseland Ballroom ን ዓርባዕተ nights ካብ ፍሉይ :performances እቲ 4Intimate Nights ምስ Beyoncé concerts ሪኤ እቲ ብቅዓት ካብ ንሳ 4album ናብ ሓደ standing ክፍሊ .ጥራሕ

passage: Her fourth studio album 4was released on June 28, 2011in the US. 4sold 310,000 copies in its first week and debuted atop the Billboard 200 chart, giving Beyoncé her fourth consecutive number-one album in the US. The album was preceded by two of its singles \'Run the World (Girls)\' and \'Best Thing I Never Had\', which both attained moderate success. The fourth single \'Love on Top\' was a commercial success in the US. 4also produced four other singles; \'Party\', \'Countdown\', \'I Care\' and \'End of Time\'. \'Eat, Play, Love\', a cover story written by Beyoncé for Essence that detailed her 2010 career break, won her a writing award from the New York Association of Black Journalists. In late 2011, she took the stage at New York's Roseland Ballroom for four nights of special performances: the 4Intimate Nights with Beyoncé concerts saw the performance of her 4album to a standing room only.

passage: Her fourth studio album 4was released on June 28, 2011in the US. 4sold 310,000 copies in its first week and debuted atop the Billboard 200 chart, giving Beyoncé her fourth consecutive number-one album in the US. The album was preceded by two of its singles \'Run the World (Girls)\' and \'Best Thing I Never Had\', which both attained moderate success. The fourth single \'Love on Top\' was a commercial success in the US. 4also produced four other singles; \'Party\', \'Countdown\', \'I Care\' and \'End of Time\'. \'Eat, Play, Love\', a cover story written by Beyoncé for Essence that detailed her 2010 career break, won her a writing award from the New York Association of Black Journalists. In late 2011, she took the stage at New York's Roseland Ballroom for four nights of special performances: the 4Intimate Nights with Beyoncé concerts saw the performance of her 4album to a standing room only.
question: Which aspect of the '4Intimate Nights with Beyoncé' concerts is highlighted in the passage?
mc_answer1: They were held in a large stadium
mc_answer3: They were performed to a standing room only

passage: On December 13, 2013, Beyoncé unexpectedly released her eponymous fifth studio album on the iTunes Store without any prior announcement or promotion. The album debuted atop the Billboard 200 chart, giving Beyoncé her fifth consecutive number-one album in the US. This made her the first woman in the chart's history to have her first five studio albums debut at number one. Beyoncé received critical acclaim and commercial success, selling one million digital copies worldwide in six days; The New York Times noted the album's unconventional, unexpected release as significant. Musically an electro‐R&B album, it concerns darker themes previously unexplored in her work, such as \'bulimia, postnatal depression [and] the fears and insecurities of marriage and motherhood\'. The single \'Drunk in Love\', featuring Jay Z, peaked at number two on the Billboard Hot 100 chart. In April 2014, after much speculation, Beyoncé and Jay Z officially announced their On the Run Tour— their first co‐headlining stadium tour together. On August 24, 2014, she received the Video Vanguard Award at the 2014MTV Video Music Awards, also taking home three competitive awards: Best Video with a Social Message and Best Cinematography for \'Pretty Hurts\', as well as Best Collaboration for \'Drunk in Love\'. In November, Forbes reported that Beyoncé was the top‐earning woman in music for the second year in a row—earning $115 million that year, more than double her 2013earnings. Beyoncé was reissued with new material in three forms: as an extended play, a box set, and a full platinum edition.
question: On what date did Beyoncé release her eponymous fifth studio album on iTunes without any prior promotion?
translated_passage: አብ ልዕሊ ታሕሳስ ,13 ,2013 Beyoncé unexpectedly ተለቒቑ ንሳ eponymous fifth studio album አብ ልዕሊ እቲ iTunes መኽዝን ብዘይካ ዝኾነ ቅድሚያ ምልክታ ወይ .ምስግጋር እቲ album debuted atop እቲ Billboard 200 ,ካርታ ባሕሪ giving Beyoncé ንሳ fifth consecutive -number-one album አብ ውሽጢ እቲ .ንሕና እዚ ዝተሰርሐ ንሳ እቲ መጀመርታ ሰበይቲ አብ ውሽጢ እቲ 'chart's ታሪኽ ናብ ኣለኒ ንሳ መጀመርታ ሓሙሽተ studio albums debut ኣብ ቑጽሪ .ሓደ Beyoncé ዝተቀበለ ወሳኒ acclaim እና ንግዳዊ ,ዓወት selling ሓደ ሚልዮን digital copies worldwide አብ ውሽጢ ሽዱሽተ ;days እቲ ሓድሽ York Times ተመዝጊቡ እቲ 'album's ,unconventional unexpected ስደድ ከም .ግዙፍ Musically ሓደ &electro‐R&B ,album እቲ ነገር concerns darker themes previously unexplored አብ ውሽጢ ንሳ ,ስራሕ ከምዚ ከም \',bulimia postnatal ጭንቀት []እና እቲ fears እና insecurities ካብ መርዓ እና \'.motherhood እቲ ነፀላ \'ሰኽራም አብ ውሽጢ \',ፍቅሪ featuring Jay ,Z peaked ኣብ ቑጽሪ ክልተ አብ ልዕሊ እቲ Billboard ምዉቅ 100 .ካርታ ባሕሪ አብ ውሽጢ ጉንበት ,2014 ድሕሪ ብዙሕ ,speculation Beyoncé እና Jay Z officially announced ናቶም አብ ልዕሊ እቲ ጉየ Tour— ናቶም መጀመርታ co‐headlining stadium ዙር .ብሓባር አብ ልዕሊ ነሓሰ ,24 ,2014 እሳ ዝተቀበለ እቲ ቪዲዮ Vanguard ሽልማት ኣብ እቲ 2014MTV ቪዲዮ ሙዚቃ ,Awards እውን taking ገዛ ሰለስተ ተወዳዳሪ :awards ምሩፅ ቪዲዮ ምስ ሓደ ማሕበራዊ መልእኽቲ እና ምሩፅ Cinematography ን \'ሽኮር \',Hurts ከም ደሓን ከም ምሩፅ Collaboration ን \'ሰኽራም አብ ውሽጢ \'.ፍቅሪ አብ ውሽጢ ,ሕዳር Forbes reported እቲ Beyoncé ኔሩ እቲ top‐earning ሰበይቲ አብ ውሽጢ ሙዚቃ ን እቲ ካልኣይ ዓመት አብ ውሽጢ ሓደ row—earning $115 ሚልዮን እቲ ,ዓመት ቡዙሕ ካብ ዕፅፊ ንሳ .2013earnings Beyoncé ኔሩ reissued ምስ ሓድሽ ናውቲ አብ ውሽጢ ሰለስተ :forms ከም ሓደ ተናዊሑ ,ተፃወት ሓደ ሳንዱቕ ,ፅምዲ እና ሓደ ሙሉእ platinum .edition

question: What achievement did the album's debut on the Billboard 200 chart mark for Beyoncé?
mc_answer4: Her tenth album to top the chart
translated_passage: አብ ልዕሊ ታሕሳስ ,13 ,2013 Beyoncé unexpectedly ተለቒቑ ንሳ eponymous fifth studio album አብ ልዕሊ እቲ iTunes መኽዝን ብዘይካ ዝኾነ ቅድሚያ ምልክታ ወይ .ምስግጋር እቲ album debuted atop እቲ Billboard 200 ,ካርታ ባሕሪ giving Beyoncé ንሳ fifth consecutive -number-one album አብ ውሽጢ እቲ .ንሕና እዚ ዝተሰርሐ ንሳ እቲ መጀመርታ ሰበይቲ አብ ውሽጢ እቲ 'chart's ታሪኽ ናብ ኣለኒ ንሳ መጀመርታ ሓሙሽተ studio albums debut ኣብ ቑጽሪ .ሓደ Beyoncé ዝተቀበለ ወሳኒ acclaim እና ንግዳዊ ,ዓወት selling ሓደ ሚልዮን digital copies worldwide አብ ውሽጢ ሽዱሽተ ;days እቲ ሓድሽ York Times ተመዝጊቡ እቲ 'album's ,unconventional unexpected ስደድ ከም .ግዙፍ Musically ሓደ &electro‐R&B ,album እቲ ነገር concerns darker themes previously unexplored አብ ውሽጢ ንሳ ,ስራሕ ከምዚ ከም \',bulimia postnatal ጭንቀት []እና እቲ fears እና insecurities ካብ መርዓ እና \'.motherhood እቲ ነፀላ \'ሰኽራም አብ ውሽጢ \',ፍቅሪ featuring Jay ,Z peaked ኣብ ቑጽሪ ክልተ አብ ልዕሊ እቲ Billboard ምዉቅ 100 .ካርታ ባሕሪ አብ ውሽጢ ጉንበት ,2014 ድሕሪ ብዙሕ ,speculation Beyoncé እና Jay Z officially announced ናቶም አብ ልዕሊ እቲ ጉየ Tour— ናቶም መጀመርታ co‐headlining stadium ዙር .ብሓባር አብ ልዕሊ ነሓሰ ,24 ,2014 እሳ ዝተቀበለ እቲ ቪዲዮ Vanguard ሽልማት ኣብ እቲ 2014MTV ቪዲዮ ሙዚቃ ,Awards እውን taking ገዛ ሰለስተ ተወዳዳሪ :awards ምሩፅ ቪዲዮ ምስ ሓደ ማሕበራዊ መልእኽቲ እና ምሩፅ Cinematography ን \'ሽኮር \',Hurts ከም ደሓን ከም ምሩፅ Collaboration ን \'ሰኽራም አብ ውሽጢ \'.ፍቅሪ አብ ውሽጢ ,ሕዳር Forbes reported እቲ Beyoncé ኔሩ እቲ top‐earning ሰበይቲ አብ ውሽጢ ሙዚቃ ን እቲ ካልኣይ ዓመት አብ ውሽጢ ሓደ row—earning $115 ሚልዮን እቲ ,ዓመት ቡዙሕ ካብ ዕፅፊ ንሳ .2013earnings Beyoncé ኔሩ reissued ምስ ሓድሽ ናውቲ አብ ውሽጢ ሰለስተ :forms ከም ሓደ ተናዊሑ ,ተፃወት ሓደ ሳንዱቕ ,ፅምዲ እና ሓደ ሙሉእ platinum .edition
translated_question: እንታይ ዓወት ግቡር እቲ 'album's debut አብ ልዕሊ እቲ Billboard 200 ካርታ ባሕሪ mark ን ?Beyoncé
translated_mc_answer4: ንሳ tenth album ናብ ላዕለዋይ እቲ ካርታ ባሕሪ

passage: On December 13, 2013, Beyoncé unexpectedly released her eponymous fifth studio album on the iTunes Store without any prior announcement or promotion. The album debuted atop the Billboard 200 chart, giving Beyoncé her fifth consecutive number-one album in the US. This made her the first woman in the chart's history to have her first five studio albums debut at number one. Beyoncé received critical acclaim and commercial success, selling one million digital copies worldwide in six days; The New York Times noted the album's unconventional, unexpected release as significant. Musically an electro‐R&B album, it concerns darker themes previously unexplored in her work, such as \'bulimia, postnatal depression [and] the fears and insecurities of marriage and motherhood\'. The single \'Drunk in Love\', featuring Jay Z, peaked at number two on the Billboard Hot 100 chart. In April 2014, after much speculation, Beyoncé and Jay Z officially announced their On the Run Tour— their first co‐headlining stadium tour together. On August 24, 2014, she received the Video Vanguard Award at the 2014MTV Video Music Awards, also taking home three competitive awards: Best Video with a Social Message and Best Cinematography for \'Pretty Hurts\', as well as Best Collaboration for \'Drunk in Love\'. In November, Forbes reported that Beyoncé was the top‐earning woman in music for the second year in a row—earning $115 million that year, more than double her 2013earnings. Beyoncé was reissued with new material in three forms: as an extended play, a box set, and a full platinum edition.
question: What record did Beyoncé set with her first five studio albums on the Billboard 200?
mc_answer1: First artist to have all albums go platinum
mc_answer2: First woman to have her first five studio albums debut at number one
mc_answer3: First artist to debut an album at number one
mc_answer4: First woman to win Album of the Year five times

translated_passage: አብ ልዕሊ ታሕሳስ ,13 ,2013 Beyoncé unexpectedly ተለቒቑ ንሳ eponymous fifth studio album አብ ልዕሊ እቲ iTunes መኽዝን ብዘይካ ዝኾነ ቅድሚያ ምልክታ ወይ .ምስግጋር እቲ album debuted atop እቲ Billboard 200 ,ካርታ ባሕሪ giving Beyoncé ንሳ fifth consecutive -number-one album አብ ውሽጢ እቲ .ንሕና እዚ ዝተሰርሐ ንሳ እቲ መጀመርታ ሰበይቲ አብ ውሽጢ እቲ 'chart's ታሪኽ ናብ ኣለኒ ንሳ መጀመርታ ሓሙሽተ studio albums debut ኣብ ቑጽሪ .ሓደ Beyoncé ዝተቀበለ ወሳኒ acclaim እና ንግዳዊ ,ዓወት selling ሓደ ሚልዮን digital copies worldwide አብ ውሽጢ ሽዱሽተ ;days እቲ ሓድሽ York Times ተመዝጊቡ እቲ 'album's ,unconventional unexpected ስደድ ከም .ግዙፍ Musically ሓደ &electro‐R&B ,album እቲ ነገር concerns darker themes previously unexplored አብ ውሽጢ ንሳ ,ስራሕ ከምዚ ከም \',bulimia postnatal ጭንቀት []እና እቲ fears እና insecurities ካብ መርዓ እና \'.motherhood እቲ ነፀላ \'ሰኽራም አብ ውሽጢ \',ፍቅሪ featuring Jay ,Z peaked ኣብ ቑጽሪ ክልተ አብ ልዕሊ እቲ Billboard ምዉቅ 100 .ካርታ ባሕሪ አብ ውሽጢ ጉንበት ,2014 ድሕሪ ብዙሕ ,speculation Beyoncé እና Jay Z officially announced ናቶም አብ ልዕሊ እቲ ጉየ Tour— ናቶም መጀመርታ co‐headlining stadium ዙር .ብሓባር አብ ልዕሊ ነሓሰ ,24 ,2014 እሳ ዝተቀበለ እቲ ቪዲዮ Vanguard ሽልማት ኣብ እቲ 2014MTV ቪዲዮ ሙዚቃ ,Awards እውን taking ገዛ ሰለስተ ተወዳዳሪ :awards ምሩፅ ቪዲዮ ምስ ሓደ ማሕበራዊ መልእኽቲ እና ምሩፅ Cinematography ን \'ሽኮር \',Hurts ከም ደሓን ከም ምሩፅ Collaboration ን \'ሰኽራም አብ ውሽጢ \'.ፍቅሪ አብ ውሽጢ ,ሕዳር Forbes reported እቲ Beyoncé ኔሩ እቲ top‐earning ሰበይቲ አብ ውሽጢ ሙዚቃ ን እቲ ካልኣይ ዓመት አብ ውሽጢ ሓደ row—earning $115 ሚልዮን እቲ ,ዓመት ቡዙሕ ካብ ዕፅፊ ንሳ .2013earnings Beyoncé ኔሩ reissued ምስ ሓድሽ ናውቲ አብ ውሽጢ ሰለስተ :forms ከም ሓደ ተናዊሑ ,ተፃወት ሓደ ሳንዱቕ ,ፅምዲ እና ሓደ ሙሉእ platinum .edition
translated_question: ከመይ እዩ እቲ album musically ?categorized

passage: On December 13, 2013, Beyoncé unexpectedly released her eponymous fifth studio album on the iTunes Store without any prior announcement or promotion. The album debuted atop the Billboard 200 chart, giving Beyoncé her fifth consecutive number-one album in the US. This made her the first woman in the chart's history to have her first five studio albums debut at number one. Beyoncé received critical acclaim and commercial success, selling one million digital copies worldwide in six days; The New York Times noted the album's unconventional, unexpected release as significant. Musically an electro‐R&B album, it concerns darker themes previously unexplored in her work, such as \'bulimia, postnatal depression [and] the fears and insecurities of marriage and motherhood\'. The single \'Drunk in Love\', featuring Jay Z, peaked at number two on the Billboard Hot 100 chart. In April 2014, after much speculation, Beyoncé and Jay Z officially announced their On the Run Tour— their first co‐headlining stadium tour together. On August 24, 2014, she received the Video Vanguard Award at the 2014MTV Video Music Awards, also taking home three competitive awards: Best Video with a Social Message and Best Cinematography for \'Pretty Hurts\', as well as Best Collaboration for \'Drunk in Love\'. In November, Forbes reported that Beyoncé was the top‐earning woman in music for the second year in a row—earning $115 million that year, more than double her 2013earnings. Beyoncé was reissued with new material in three forms: as an extended play, a box set, and a full platinum edition.
question: Which darker themes are explored in the album that were previously unexplored in her work?
mc_answer2: Bulimia, postnatal depression, and the fears and insecurities of marriage and motherhood

translated_passage: አብ ልዕሊ ታሕሳስ ,13 ,2013 Beyoncé unexpectedly ተለቒቑ ንሳ eponymous fifth studio album አብ ልዕሊ እቲ iTunes መኽዝን ብዘይካ ዝኾነ ቅድሚያ ምልክታ ወይ .ምስግጋር እቲ album debuted atop እቲ Billboard 200 ,ካርታ ባሕሪ giving Beyoncé ንሳ fifth consecutive -number-one album አብ ውሽጢ እቲ .ንሕና እዚ ዝተሰርሐ ንሳ እቲ መጀመርታ ሰበይቲ አብ ውሽጢ እቲ 'chart's ታሪኽ ናብ ኣለኒ ንሳ መጀመርታ ሓሙሽተ studio albums debut ኣብ ቑጽሪ .ሓደ Beyoncé ዝተቀበለ ወሳኒ acclaim እና ንግዳዊ ,ዓወት selling ሓደ ሚልዮን digital copies worldwide አብ ውሽጢ ሽዱሽተ ;days እቲ ሓድሽ York Times ተመዝጊቡ እቲ 'album's ,unconventional unexpected ስደድ ከም .ግዙፍ Musically ሓደ &electro‐R&B ,album እቲ ነገር concerns darker themes previously unexplored አብ ውሽጢ ንሳ ,ስራሕ ከምዚ ከም \',bulimia postnatal ጭንቀት []እና እቲ fears እና insecurities ካብ መርዓ እና \'.motherhood እቲ ነፀላ \'ሰኽራም አብ ውሽጢ \',ፍቅሪ featuring Jay ,Z peaked ኣብ ቑጽሪ ክልተ አብ ልዕሊ እቲ Billboard ምዉቅ 100 .ካርታ ባሕሪ አብ ውሽጢ ጉንበት ,2014 ድሕሪ ብዙሕ ,speculation Beyoncé እና Jay Z officially announced ናቶም አብ ልዕሊ እቲ ጉየ Tour— ናቶም መጀመርታ co‐headlining stadium ዙር .ብሓባር አብ ልዕሊ ነሓሰ ,24 ,2014 እሳ ዝተቀበለ እቲ ቪዲዮ Vanguard ሽልማት ኣብ እቲ 2014MTV ቪዲዮ ሙዚቃ ,Awards እውን taking ገዛ ሰለስተ ተወዳዳሪ :awards ምሩፅ ቪዲዮ ምስ ሓደ ማሕበራዊ መልእኽቲ እና ምሩፅ Cinematography ን \'ሽኮር \',Hurts ከም ደሓን ከም ምሩፅ Collaboration ን \'ሰኽራም አብ ውሽጢ \'.ፍቅሪ አብ ውሽጢ ,ሕዳር Forbes reported እቲ Beyoncé ኔሩ እቲ top‐earning ሰበይቲ አብ ውሽጢ ሙዚቃ ን እቲ ካልኣይ ዓመት አብ ውሽጢ ሓደ row—earning $115 ሚልዮን እቲ ,ዓመት ቡዙሕ ካብ ዕፅፊ ንሳ .2013earnings Beyoncé ኔሩ reissued ምስ ሓድሽ ናውቲ አብ ውሽጢ ሰለስተ :forms ከም ሓደ ተናዊሑ ,ተፃወት ሓደ ሳንዱቕ ,ፅምዲ እና ሓደ ሙሉእ platinum .edition
translated_question: እንታይ ዙር ግቡር Beyoncé እና Jay Z announce አብ ውሽጢ ጉንበት ?2014

passage: On December 13, 2013, Beyoncé unexpectedly released her eponymous fifth studio album on the iTunes Store without any prior announcement or promotion. The album debuted atop the Billboard 200 chart, giving Beyoncé her fifth consecutive number-one album in the US. This made her the first woman in the chart's history to have her first five studio albums debut at number one. Beyoncé received critical acclaim and commercial success, selling one million digital copies worldwide in six days; The New York Times noted the album's unconventional, unexpected release as significant. Musically an electro‐R&B album, it concerns darker themes previously unexplored in her work, such as \'bulimia, postnatal depression [and] the fears and insecurities of marriage and motherhood\'. The single \'Drunk in Love\', featuring Jay Z, peaked at number two on the Billboard Hot 100 chart. In April 2014, after much speculation, Beyoncé and Jay Z officially announced their On the Run Tour— their first co‐headlining stadium tour together. On August 24, 2014, she received the Video Vanguard Award at the 2014MTV Video Music Awards, also taking home three competitive awards: Best Video with a Social Message and Best Cinematography for \'Pretty Hurts\', as well as Best Collaboration for \'Drunk in Love\'. In November, Forbes reported that Beyoncé was the top‐earning woman in music for the second year in a row—earning $115 million that year, more than double her 2013earnings. Beyoncé was reissued with new material in three forms: as an extended play, a box set, and a full platinum edition.
question: What milestone did the On the Run Tour represent for the couple?

translated_passage: አብ ልዕሊ ታሕሳስ ,13 ,2013 Beyoncé unexpectedly ተለቒቑ ንሳ eponymous fifth studio album አብ ልዕሊ እቲ iTunes መኽዝን ብዘይካ ዝኾነ ቅድሚያ ምልክታ ወይ .ምስግጋር እቲ album debuted atop እቲ Billboard 200 ,ካርታ ባሕሪ giving Beyoncé ንሳ fifth consecutive -number-one album አብ ውሽጢ እቲ .ንሕና እዚ ዝተሰርሐ ንሳ እቲ መጀመርታ ሰበይቲ አብ ውሽጢ እቲ 'chart's ታሪኽ ናብ ኣለኒ ንሳ መጀመርታ ሓሙሽተ studio albums debut ኣብ ቑጽሪ .ሓደ Beyoncé ዝተቀበለ ወሳኒ acclaim እና ንግዳዊ ,ዓወት selling ሓደ ሚልዮን digital copies worldwide አብ ውሽጢ ሽዱሽተ ;days እቲ ሓድሽ York Times ተመዝጊቡ እቲ 'album's ,unconventional unexpected ስደድ ከም .ግዙፍ Musically ሓደ &electro‐R&B ,album እቲ ነገር concerns darker themes previously unexplored አብ ውሽጢ ንሳ ,ስራሕ ከምዚ ከም \',bulimia postnatal ጭንቀት []እና እቲ fears እና insecurities ካብ መርዓ እና \'.motherhood እቲ ነፀላ \'ሰኽራም አብ ውሽጢ \',ፍቅሪ featuring Jay ,Z peaked ኣብ ቑጽሪ ክልተ አብ ልዕሊ እቲ Billboard ምዉቅ 100 .ካርታ ባሕሪ አብ ውሽጢ ጉንበት ,2014 ድሕሪ ብዙሕ ,speculation Beyoncé እና Jay Z officially announced ናቶም አብ ልዕሊ እቲ ጉየ Tour— ናቶም መጀመርታ co‐headlining stadium ዙር .ብሓባር አብ ልዕሊ ነሓሰ ,24 ,2014 እሳ ዝተቀበለ እቲ ቪዲዮ Vanguard ሽልማት ኣብ እቲ 2014MTV ቪዲዮ ሙዚቃ ,Awards እውን taking ገዛ ሰለስተ ተወዳዳሪ :awards ምሩፅ ቪዲዮ ምስ ሓደ ማሕበራዊ መልእኽቲ እና ምሩፅ Cinematography ን \'ሽኮር \',Hurts ከም ደሓን ከም ምሩፅ Collaboration ን \'ሰኽራም አብ ውሽጢ \'.ፍቅሪ አብ ውሽጢ ,ሕዳር Forbes reported እቲ Beyoncé ኔሩ እቲ top‐earning ሰበይቲ አብ ውሽጢ ሙዚቃ ን እቲ ካልኣይ ዓመት አብ ውሽጢ ሓደ row—earning $115 ሚልዮን እቲ ,ዓመት ቡዙሕ ካብ ዕፅፊ ንሳ .2013earnings Beyoncé ኔሩ reissued ምስ ሓድሽ ናውቲ አብ ውሽጢ ሰለስተ :forms ከም ሓደ ተናዊሑ ,ተፃወት ሓደ ሳንዱቕ ,ፅምዲ እና ሓደ ሙሉእ platinum .edition
translated_question: አየናይ ፅምዲ ካብ awards ግቡር Beyoncé ዓወት ኣብ እቲ 2014MTV ቪዲዮ ሙዚቃ ?Awards
translated_mc_answer2: ምሩፅ ቪዲዮ ምስ ሓደ ማሕበራዊ ,መልእኽቲ ምሩፅ Cinematography ን 'ሽኮር ',Hurts እና ምሩፅ Collaboration ን 'ሰኽራም አብ ውሽጢ 'ፍቅሪ
translated_mc_answer4: ምሩፅ ሓድሽ ኣርቲስት እና ምሩፅ Collaboration

passage: On December 13, 2013, Beyoncé unexpectedly released her eponymous fifth studio album on the iTunes Store without any prior announcement or promotion. The album debuted atop the Billboard 200 chart, giving Beyoncé her fifth consecutive number-one album in the US. This made her the first woman in the chart's history to have her first five studio albums debut at number one. Beyoncé received critical acclaim and commercial success, selling one million digital copies worldwide in six days; The New York Times noted the album's unconventional, unexpected release as significant. Musically an electro‐R&B album, it concerns darker themes previously unexplored in her work, such as \'bulimia, postnatal depression [and] the fears and insecurities of marriage and motherhood\'. The single \'Drunk in Love\', featuring Jay Z, peaked at number two on the Billboard Hot 100 chart. In April 2014, after much speculation, Beyoncé and Jay Z officially announced their On the Run Tour— their first co‐headlining stadium tour together. On August 24, 2014, she received the Video Vanguard Award at the 2014MTV Video Music Awards, also taking home three competitive awards: Best Video with a Social Message and Best Cinematography for \'Pretty Hurts\', as well as Best Collaboration for \'Drunk in Love\'. In November, Forbes reported that Beyoncé was the top‐earning woman in music for the second year in a row—earning $115 million that year, more than double her 2013earnings. Beyoncé was reissued with new material in three forms: as an extended play, a box set, and a full platinum edition.
question: According to Forbes, how much did Beyoncé earn in the reported year, making her the top-earning woman in music for the second year in a row?

passage: At the 57th Annual Grammy Awards in February 2015, Beyoncé was nominated for six awards, ultimately winning three: Best R&B Performance and Best R&B Song for \'Drunk in Love\', and Best Surround Sound Album for Beyoncé. She was nominated for Album of the Year but the award was won by Beck for his Morning Phase album. In August, the cover of the September issue of Vogue magazine was unveiled online, Beyoncé as the cover star, becoming the first African-American artist and third African-American woman in general to cover the September issue. She headlined the 2015 Made in America festival in early September and also the Global Citizen Festival later that month. Beyoncé made an uncredited featured appearance on the track \'Hymn for the Weekend\' by British rock band Coldplay, on their seventh studio album A Head Full of Dreams (2015), which saw release in December. On January 7, 2016, Pepsi announced Beyoncé would perform alongside Coldplay at Super Bowl 50 in February. Knowles has previously performed at four Super Bowl shows throughout her career, serving as the main headliner of the 47th Super Bowl halftime show in 2013.
question: How many Grammy Awards was Beyoncé nominated for at the 57th Annual Grammy Awards?
translated_passage: ኣብ እቲ 57th ዓመታዊ Grammy Awards አብ ውሽጢ ለካቲት ,2015 Beyoncé ኔሩ nominated ን ሽዱሽተ ,awards ultimately winning :ሰለስተ ምሩፅ &R&B ብቅዓት እና ምሩፅ &R&B ደርፊ ን \'ሰኽራም አብ ውሽጢ \',ፍቅሪ እና ምሩፅ Surround ድምጺ Album ን .Beyoncé እሳ ኔሩ nominated ን Album ካብ እቲ ዓመት ግን እቲ ሽልማት ኔሩ ተዓወተ ብ Beck ን ናቱ ጉሓት ደረጃ .album አብ ውሽጢ ,ነሓሰ እቲ ሽፋን ካብ እቲ መስከረም ፀገም ካብ Vogue ጋዜጣ ኔሩ unveiled ,ኦንላይን Beyoncé ከም እቲ ሽፋን ,ኮኾብ becoming እቲ መጀመርታ -African-American ኣርቲስት እና ሳልሳይ -African-American ሰበይቲ አብ ውሽጢ ሓፈሻዊ ናብ ሽፋን እቲ መስከረም .ፀገም እሳ headlined እቲ 2015 ዝተሰርሐ አብ ውሽጢ America በዓል አብ ውሽጢ ብግዘ መስከረም እና እውን እቲ ዓለምለኻዊ ዜጋ በዓል ዳሕራይ እቲ .ወርሒ Beyoncé ዝተሰርሐ ሓደ uncredited featured ቁመና አብ ልዕሊ እቲ ናይ ፅዕነት መኪና \'Hymn ን እቲ \'ቀዳመ-ሰንበት ብ British ከውሒ ባንድ ,Coldplay አብ ልዕሊ ናቶም seventh studio album ሓደ ርእሲ ሙሉእ ካብ Dreams (),2015 አየናይ ሪኤ ስደድ አብ ውሽጢ .ታሕሳስ አብ ልዕሊ ጥሪ ,7 ,2016 Pepsi announced Beyoncé ይኸውን ግበር alongside Coldplay ኣብ ብሉፅ ኣጋር 50 አብ ውሽጢ .ለካቲት Knowles ኣለዎ previously performed ኣብ ዓርባዕተ ብሉፅ ኣጋር shows በቲ ንሳ ,ሞያ serving ከም እቲ ዋና headliner ካብ እቲ 47th ብሉፅ ኣጋር halftime አርኢ አብ ውሽጢ .2013
translated_question: ከመይ ቡዙሕ Grammy Awards ኔሩ Beyoncé nominated ን ኣብ እቲ 57th ዓመታዊ Grammy ?Awards

passage: At the 57th Annual Grammy Awards in February 2015, Beyoncé was nominated for six awards, ultimately winning three: Best R&B Performance and Best R&B Song for \'Drunk in Love\', and Best Surround Sound Album for Beyoncé. She was nominated for Album of the Year but the award was won by Beck for his Morning Phase album. In August, the cover of the September issue of Vogue magazine was unveiled online, Beyoncé as the cover star, becoming the first African-American artist and third African-American woman in general to cover the September issue. She headlined the 2015 Made in America festival in early September and also the Global Citizen Festival later that month. Beyoncé made an uncredited featured appearance on the track \'Hymn for the Weekend\' by British rock band Coldplay, on their seventh studio album A Head Full of Dreams (2015), which saw release in December. On January 7, 2016, Pepsi announced Beyoncé would perform alongside Coldplay at Super Bowl 50 in February. Knowles has previously performed at four Super Bowl shows throughout her career, serving as the main headliner of the 47th Super Bowl halftime show in 2013.
question: Which awards did Beyoncé win at the 57th Annual Grammy Awards?
mc_answer1: Best Pop Vocal Album and Best New Artist
mc_answer2: Best R&B Performance, Best R&B Song, and Best Surround Sound Album
mc_answer3: Album of the Year and Record of the Year
mc_answer4: Best Music Video and Best Collaboration

translated_passage: ኣብ እቲ 57th ዓመታዊ Grammy Awards አብ ውሽጢ ለካቲት ,2015 Beyoncé ኔሩ nominated ን ሽዱሽተ ,awards ultimately winning :ሰለስተ ምሩፅ &R&B ብቅዓት እና ምሩፅ &R&B ደርፊ ን \'ሰኽራም አብ ውሽጢ \',ፍቅሪ እና ምሩፅ Surround ድምጺ Album ን .Beyoncé እሳ ኔሩ nominated ን Album ካብ እቲ ዓመት ግን እቲ ሽልማት ኔሩ ተዓወተ ብ Beck ን ናቱ ጉሓት ደረጃ .album አብ ውሽጢ ,ነሓሰ እቲ ሽፋን ካብ እቲ መስከረም ፀገም ካብ Vogue ጋዜጣ ኔሩ unveiled ,ኦንላይን Beyoncé ከም እቲ ሽፋን ,ኮኾብ becoming እቲ መጀመርታ -African-American ኣርቲስት እና ሳልሳይ -African-American ሰበይቲ አብ ውሽጢ ሓፈሻዊ ናብ ሽፋን እቲ መስከረም .ፀገም እሳ headlined እቲ 2015 ዝተሰርሐ አብ ውሽጢ America በዓል አብ ውሽጢ ብግዘ መስከረም እና እውን እቲ ዓለምለኻዊ ዜጋ በዓል ዳሕራይ እቲ .ወርሒ Beyoncé ዝተሰርሐ ሓደ uncredited featured ቁመና አብ ልዕሊ እቲ ናይ ፅዕነት መኪና \'Hymn ን እቲ \'ቀዳመ-ሰንበት ብ British ከውሒ ባንድ ,Coldplay አብ ልዕሊ ናቶም seventh studio album ሓደ ርእሲ ሙሉእ ካብ Dreams (),2015 አየናይ ሪኤ ስደድ አብ ውሽጢ .ታሕሳስ አብ ልዕሊ ጥሪ ,7 ,2016 Pepsi announced Beyoncé ይኸውን ግበር alongside Coldplay ኣብ ብሉፅ ኣጋር 50 አብ ውሽጢ .ለካቲት Knowles ኣለዎ previously performed ኣብ ዓርባዕተ ብሉፅ ኣጋር shows በቲ ንሳ ,ሞያ serving ከም እቲ ዋና headliner ካብ እቲ 47th ብሉፅ ኣጋር halftime አርኢ አብ ውሽጢ .2013

passage: At the 57th Annual Grammy Awards in February 2015, Beyoncé was nominated for six awards, ultimately winning three: Best R&B Performance and Best R&B Song for \'Drunk in Love\', and Best Surround Sound Album for Beyoncé. She was nominated for Album of the Year but the award was won by Beck for his Morning Phase album. She headlined the 2015 Made in America festival in early September and also the Global Citizen Festival later that month. translated_passage: ኣብ እቲ 57th ዓመታዊ Grammy Awards አብ ውሽጢ ለካቲት ,2015 Beyoncé ኔሩ nominated ን ሽዱሽተ ,awards ultimately winning :ሰለስተ ምሩፅ &R&B ብቅዓት እና ምሩፅ &R&B ደርፊ ን \'ሰኽራም አብ ውሽጢ \',ፍቅሪ እና ምሩፅ Surround ድምጺ Album ን .Beyoncé እሳ ኔሩ nominated ን Album ካብ እቲ ዓመት ግን እቲ ሽልማት ኔሩ ተዓወተ ብ Beck ን ናቱ ጉሓት ደረጃ .album አብ ውሽጢ ,ነሓሰ እቲ ሽፋን ካብ እቲ መስከረም ፀገም ካብ Vogue ጋዜጣ ኔሩ unveiled ,ኦንላይን Beyoncé ከም እቲ ሽፋን ,ኮኾብ becoming እቲ መጀመርታ -African-American ኣርቲስት እና ሳልሳይ -African-American ሰበይቲ አብ ውሽጢ ሓፈሻዊ ናብ ሽፋን እቲ መስከረም .ፀገም እሳ headlined እቲ 2015 ዝተሰርሐ አብ ውሽጢ America በዓል አብ ውሽጢ ብግዘ መስከረም እና እውን እቲ ዓለምለኻዊ ዜጋ በዓል ዳሕራይ እቲ .ወርሒ Beyoncé ዝተሰርሐ ሓደ uncredited featured ቁመና አብ ልዕሊ እቲ ናይ ፅዕነት መኪና \'Hymn ን እቲ \'ቀዳመ-ሰንበት ብ British ከውሒ ባንድ ,Coldplay አብ ልዕሊ ናቶም seventh studio album ሓደ ርእሲ ሙሉእ ካብ Dreams (),2015 አየናይ ሪኤ ስደድ አብ ውሽጢ .ታሕሳስ አብ ልዕሊ ጥሪ ,7 ,2016 Pepsi announced Beyoncé ይኸውን ግበር alongside Coldplay ኣብ ብሉፅ ኣጋር 50 አብ ውሽጢ .ለካቲት Knowles ኣለዎ previously performed ኣብ ዓርባዕተ ብሉፅ ኣጋር shows በቲ ንሳ ,ሞያ serving ከም እቲ ዋና headliner ካብ እቲ 47th ብሉፅ ኣጋር halftime አርኢ አብ ውሽጢ .2013
translated_question: እንታይ nomination ግቡር Beyoncé ተቀበል ን 'ሰኽራም አብ ውሽጢ '?ፍቅሪ

passage: At the 57th Annual Grammy Awards in February 2015, Beyoncé was nominated for six awards, ultimately winning three: Best R&B Performance and Best R&B Song for \'Drunk in Love\', and Best Surround Sound Album for Beyoncé. She was nominated for Album of the Year but the award was won by Beck for his Morning Phase album. In August, the cover of the September issue of Vogue magazine was unveiled online, Beyoncé as the cover star, becoming the first African-American artist and third African-American woman in general to cover the September issue. She headlined the 2015 Made in America festival in early September and also the Global Citizen Festival later that month. Beyoncé made an uncredited featured appearance on the track \'Hymn for the Weekend\' by British rock band Coldplay, on their seventh studio album A Head Full of Dreams (2015), which saw release in December. On January 7, 2016, Pepsi announced Beyoncé would perform alongside Coldplay at Super Bowl 50 in February. Knowles has previously performed at four Super Bowl shows throughout her career, serving as the main headliner of the 47th Super Bowl halftime show in 2013.
question: Which global publishing partner did Beyoncé sign with in February 2013?

passage: Beyoncé is believed to have first started a relationship with Jay Z after a collaboration on ''03Bonnie & Clyde', which appeared on his seventh album The Blueprint 2: The Gift & The Curse (2002). Beyoncé appeared as Jay Z's girlfriend in the music video for the song, which would further fuel speculation of their relationship. On April 4, 2008, Beyoncé and Jay Z were married without publicity. As of April 2014, the couple have sold a combined 300 million records together. The couple are known for their private relationship, although they have appeared to become more relaxed in recent years. Beyoncé suffered a miscarriage in 2010 or 2011, describing it as 'the saddest thing' she had ever endured. She returned to the studio and wrote music in order to cope with the loss. In April 2011, Beyoncé and Jay Z traveled to Paris in order to shoot the album cover for her 4, and unexpectedly became pregnant in Paris.
question: Which collaboration is believed to have sparked Beyoncé's relationship with Jay Z?
translated_passage: Beyoncé እዩ believed ናብ ኣለኒ መጀመርታ ተጀሚሩ ሓደ ርክብ ምስ Jay Z ድሕሪ ሓደ collaboration አብ ልዕሊ ''03Bonnie & ',Clyde አየናይ ወፀ አብ ልዕሊ ናቱ seventh album እቲ Blueprint :2 እቲ ውህብቶ & እቲ መርገም ().2002 Beyoncé ወፀ ከም Jay 'Z's ናይ ፍቕሪ መሓዛ ጓል አብ ውሽጢ እቲ ሙዚቃ ቪዲዮ ን እቲ ,ደርፊ አየናይ ይኸውን ርሑቅ ነዳዲ speculation ካብ ናቶም .ርክብ አብ ልዕሊ ጉንበት ,4 ,2008 Beyoncé እና Jay Z ኔሮም ምርዕው ብዘይካ .publicity ከም ካብ ጉንበት ,2014 እቲ ፅምዲ ኣለኒ ሽዩጥ ሓደ combined 300 ሚልዮን records .ብሓባር እቲ ፅምዲ እዮም ፍሉጥ ን ናቶም ብሕታዊ ,ርክብ ዋላ እኳ ንሶም ኣለኒ ወፀ ናብ ምዃን ቡዙሕ relaxed አብ ውሽጢ ናይ ቀረባ .ዓመታት Beyoncé suffered ሓደ miscarriage አብ ውሽጢ 2010 ወይ ,2011 describing እቲ ነገር ከም 'እቲ saddest 'ነገር እሳ ዝነበረ ብስሩ .endured እሳ returned ናብ እቲ studio እና ጽሒፉ ሙዚቃ አብ ውሽጢ ስርዓት ናብ ምጽዋር ምስ እቲ .ምስኣን አብ ውሽጢ ጉንበት ,2011 Beyoncé እና Jay Z traveled ናብ Paris አብ ውሽጢ ስርዓት ናብ ምውቃዕ እቲ album ሽፋን ን ንሳ ,4 እና unexpectedly ኮይኑ ጥንስቲ አብ ውሽጢ .Paris

passage: Beyoncé is believed to have first started a relationship with Jay Z after a collaboration on ''03Bonnie & Clyde', which appeared on his seventh album The Blueprint 2: The Gift & The Curse (2002). Beyoncé appeared as Jay Z's girlfriend in the music video for the song, which would further fuel speculation of their relationship. On April 4, 2008, Beyoncé and Jay Z were married without publicity. As of April 2014, the couple have sold a combined 300 million records together. The couple are known for their private relationship, although they have appeared to become more relaxed in recent years. Beyoncé suffered a miscarriage in 2010 or 2011, describing it as 'the saddest thing' she had ever endured. She returned to the studio and wrote music in order to cope with the loss. In April 2011, Beyoncé and Jay Z traveled to Paris in order to shoot the album cover for her 4, and unexpectedly became pregnant in Paris.
question: As of April 2014, how many records have Beyoncé and Jay Z sold combined?

passage: Beyoncé is believed to have first started a relationship with Jay Z after a collaboration on ''03Bonnie & Clyde', which appeared on his seventh album The Blueprint 2: The Gift & The Curse (2002). Beyoncé appeared as Jay Z's girlfriend in the music video for the song, which would further fuel speculation of their relationship. On April 4, 2008, Beyoncé and Jay Z were married without publicity. As of April 2014, the couple have sold a combined 300 million records together. The couple are known for their private relationship, although they have appeared to become more relaxed in recent years. Beyoncé suffered a miscarriage in 2010 or 2011, describing it as 'the saddest thing' she had ever endured. She returned to the studio and wrote music in order to cope with the loss. In April 2011, Beyoncé and Jay Z traveled to Paris in order to shoot the album cover for her 4, and unexpectedly became pregnant in Paris.

passage: In August, the couple attended the 2011MTV Video Music Awards, at which Beyoncé performed \'Love on Top\' and started the performance saying \'Tonight I want you to stand up on your feet, I want you to feel the love that's growing inside of me\'. At the end of the performance, she dropped her microphone, unbuttoned her blazer and rubbed her stomach, confirming her pregnancy she had alluded to earlier in the evening. Her appearance helped that year's MTV Video Music Awards become the most-watched broadcast in MTV history, pulling in 12.4million viewers; the announcement was listed in Guinness World Records for \'most tweets per second recorded for a single event\' on Twitter, receiving 8,868 tweets per second and \'Beyonce pregnant\' was the most Googled term the week of August 29, 2011.
question: At which event did Beyoncé perform 'Love on Top' in August 2011?
translated_passage: አብ ውሽጢ ,ነሓሰ እቲ ፅምዲ attended እቲ 2011MTV ቪዲዮ ሙዚቃ ,Awards ኣብ አየናይ Beyoncé performed \'ፍቅሪ አብ ልዕሊ \'ላዕለዋይ እና ተጀሚሩ እቲ ብቅዓት saying \'ሎሚ ምሸት ኣነ ምድላይ ንስኻ ናብ ደው ምባል ሓፍ አብ ልዕሊ ናትካ ,እግሪ ኣነ ምድላይ ንስኻ ናብ ምስማዕ እቲ ፍቅሪ 'that's growing ኣብ ውሽጢ ካብ \'.ኣነ ኣብ እቲ መወዳእታ ካብ እቲ ,ብቅዓት እሳ ዝተደርበየ ንሳ ,microphone unbuttoned ንሳ blazer እና rubbed ንሳ ,ከብዲ confirming ንሳ pregnancy እሳ ዝነበረ alluded ናብ ኣቕድም ኣቢሉ አብ ውሽጢ እቲ .ምሸት ንሳ ቁመና helped እቲ 'year's MTV ቪዲዮ ሙዚቃ Awards ምዃን እቲ -most-watched ፈነወ አብ ውሽጢ MTV ,ታሪኽ pulling አብ ውሽጢ .12.4million ;viewers እቲ ምልክታ ኔሩ listed አብ ውሽጢ Guinness ዓለም Records ን \'ብጥዕሚ tweets per ካልኣይ recorded ን ሓደ ነፀላ \'ዝግጅት አብ ልዕሊ ,Twitter receiving ,8,868 tweets per ካልኣይ እና \'Beyonce \'ጥንስቲ ኔሩ እቲ ብጥዕሚ Googled ቃል እቲ ሰሙን ካብ ነሓሰ ,29 .2011

passage: With the example of the Ming court's relationship with the fifth Karmapa and other Tibetan leaders, Norbu states that Chinese Communist historians have failed to realize the significance of the religious aspect of the Ming-Tibetan relationship. He writes that the meetings of lamas with the Emperor of China were exchanges of tribute between 'the patron and the priest' and were not merely instances of a political subordinate paying tribute to a superior. He also notes that the items of tribute were Buddhist artifacts which symbolized 'the religious nature of the relationship.' Josef Kolmaš writes that the Ming dynasty did not exercise any direct political control over Tibet, content with their tribute relations that were 'almost entirely of a religious character.' Patricia Ann Berger writes that the Yongle Emperor's courting and granting of titles to lamas was his attempt to 'resurrect the relationship between China and Tibet established earlier by the Yuan dynastic founder Khubilai Khan and his guru Phagpa.' She also writes that the later Qing emperors and their Mongol associates viewed the Yongle Emperor's relationship with Tibet as 'part of a chain of reincarnation that saw this Han Chinese emperor as yet another emanation of Manjusri.'
question: According to Norbu, what have Chinese Communist historians failed to realize about the Ming-Tibetan relationship?
mc_answer1: The military strategies of the Ming court
mc_answer3: The significance of its religious aspect
translated_passage: ምስ እቲ ኣብነት ካብ እቲ Ming 'court's ርክብ ምስ እቲ fifth Karmapa እና ካልእ Tibetan ,leaders Norbu states እቲ Chinese Communist historians ኣለኒ ወዲቑ ናብ አስተብህል እቲ significance ካብ እቲ ሃይማኖታዊ ገጽታ ካብ እቲ -Ming-Tibetan .ርክብ ንሱ writes እቲ እቲ meetings ካብ lamas ምስ እቲ Emperor ካብ China ኔሮም exchanges ካብ tribute አብ መንጎ 'እቲ patron እና እቲ 'ቀሺ እና ኔሮም ዘይኮነ ጥራሕ instances ካብ ሓደ political subordinate paying tribute ናብ ሓደ .ጸብለልታ ዘለዎ ንሱ እውን notes እቲ እቲ ኣቕሑ ካብ tribute ኔሮም Buddhist artifacts አየናይ symbolized 'እቲ ሃይማኖታዊ ተፈጥሮ ካብ እቲ .'ርክብ Josef Kolmaš writes እቲ እቲ Ming dynasty ግቡር ዘይኮነ ልምምድ ዝኾነ ቕጥታ political ምቁጽጻር ልዕሊ ,Tibet ትሕዝቶ ምስ ናቶም tribute relations እቲ ኔሮም 'ዳርጋ entirely ካብ ሓደ ሃይማኖታዊ .'መልክዕ Patricia Ann Berger writes እቲ እቲ Yongle 'Emperor's courting እና granting ካብ titles ናብ lamas ኔሩ ናቱ ሙከራ ናብ 'resurrect እቲ ርክብ አብ መንጎ China እና Tibet ዝተመስረተ ኣቕድም ኣቢሉ ብ እቲ Yuan dynastic founder Khubilai Khan እና ናቱ guru .'Phagpa እሳ እውን writes እቲ እቲ ዳሕራይ Qing emperors እና ናቶም Mongol associates viewed እቲ Yongle 'Emperor's ርክብ ምስ Tibet ከም 'ክፋል ካብ ሓደ ሰንሰለት ካብ reincarnation እቲ ሪኤ እዚ Han Chinese emperor ከም እስካብ ዛሕዚ ካልእ emanation ካብ .'Manjusri
translated_question: ከም ናብ ,Norbu እንታይ ኣለኒ Chinese Communist historians ወዲቑ ናብ አስተብህል ብዝዕባ እቲ -Ming-Tibetan ?ርክብ
translated_mc_answer1: እቲ ወተሃደራዊ ኣገልግሎት strategies ካብ እቲ Ming ቤት ፍርዲ
translated_mc_answer3: እቲ significance ካብ ናቱ ሃይማኖታዊ ገጽታ

passage: With the example of the Ming court's relationship with the fifth Karmapa and other Tibetan leaders, Norbu states that Chinese Communist historians have failed to realize the significance of the religious aspect of the Ming-Tibetan relationship. He writes that the meetings of lamas with the Emperor of China were exchanges of tribute between 'the patron and the priest' and were not merely instances of a political subordinate paying tribute to a superior. He also notes that the items of tribute were Buddhist artifacts which symbolized 'the religious nature of the relationship.' Josef Kolmaš writes that the Ming dynasty did not exercise any direct political control over Tibet, content with their tribute relations that were 'almost entirely of a religious character.' Patricia Ann Berger writes that the Yongle Emperor's courting and granting of titles to lamas was his attempt to 'resurrect the relationship between China and Tibet established earlier by the Yuan dynastic founder Khubilai Khan and his guru Phagpa.' She also writes that the later Qing emperors and their Mongol associates viewed the Yongle Emperor's relationship with Tibet as 'part of a chain of reincarnation that saw this Han Chinese emperor as yet another emanation of Manjusri.'
question: How does Norbu describe the meetings between lamas and the Emperor of China?
mc_answer2: As exchanges of tribute between 'the patron and the priest'

translated_question: ከመይ ምግባር Norbu ግለፅ እቲ meetings አብ መንጎ lamas እና እቲ Emperor ካብ ?China

passage: With the example of the Ming court's relationship with the fifth Karmapa and other Tibetan leaders, Norbu states that Chinese Communist historians have failed to realize the significance of the religious aspect of the Ming-Tibetan relationship. He writes that the meetings of lamas with the Emperor of China were exchanges of tribute between 'the patron and the priest' and were not merely instances of a political subordinate paying tribute to a superior. He also notes that the items of tribute were Buddhist artifacts which symbolized 'the religious nature of the relationship.' Josef Kolmaš writes that the Ming dynasty did not exercise any direct political control over Tibet, content with their tribute relations that were 'almost entirely of a religious character.' Patricia Ann Berger writes that the Yongle Emperor's courting and granting of titles to lamas was his attempt to 'resurrect the relationship between China and Tibet established earlier by the Yuan dynastic founder Khubilai Khan and his guru Phagpa.' She also writes that the later Qing emperors and their Mongol associates viewed the Yongle Emperor's relationship with Tibet as 'part of a chain of reincarnation that saw this Han Chinese emperor as yet another emanation of Manjusri.'
question: What does Josef Kolmaš claim about the Ming dynasty's control over Tibet?
mc_answer2: They established a strong military presence
mc_answer3: They were content with tribute relations of a religious character

mc_answer3: The relationship between China and Tibet established by Khubilai Khan and his guru Phagpa
mc_answer4: The political structure of the Qing dynasty
translated_passage: ምስ እቲ ኣብነት ካብ እቲ Ming 'court's ርክብ ምስ እቲ fifth Karmapa እና ካልእ Tibetan ,leaders Norbu states እቲ Chinese Communist historians ኣለኒ ወዲቑ ናብ አስተብህል እቲ significance ካብ እቲ ሃይማኖታዊ ገጽታ ካብ እቲ -Ming-Tibetan .ርክብ ንሱ writes እቲ እቲ meetings ካብ lamas ምስ እቲ Emperor ካብ China ኔሮም exchanges ካብ tribute አብ መንጎ 'እቲ patron እና እቲ 'ቀሺ እና ኔሮም ዘይኮነ ጥራሕ instances ካብ ሓደ political subordinate paying tribute ናብ ሓደ .ጸብለልታ ዘለዎ ንሱ እውን notes እቲ እቲ ኣቕሑ ካብ tribute ኔሮም Buddhist artifacts አየናይ symbolized 'እቲ ሃይማኖታዊ ተፈጥሮ ካብ እቲ .'ርክብ Josef Kolmaš writes እቲ እቲ Ming dynasty ግቡር ዘይኮነ ልምምድ ዝኾነ ቕጥታ political ምቁጽጻር ልዕሊ ,Tibet ትሕዝቶ ምስ ናቶም tribute relations እቲ ኔሮም 'ዳርጋ entirely ካብ ሓደ ሃይማኖታዊ .'መልክዕ Patricia Ann Berger writes እቲ እቲ Yongle 'Emperor's courting እና granting ካብ titles ናብ lamas ኔሩ ናቱ ሙከራ ናብ 'resurrect እቲ ርክብ አብ መንጎ China እና Tibet ዝተመስረተ ኣቕድም ኣቢሉ ብ እቲ Yuan dynastic founder Khubilai Khan እና ናቱ guru .'Phagpa እሳ እውን writes እቲ እቲ ዳሕራይ Qing emperors እና ናቶም Mongol associates viewed እቲ Yongle 'Emperor's ርክብ ምስ Tibet ከም 'ክፋል ካብ ሓደ ሰንሰለት ካብ reincarnation እቲ ሪኤ እዚ Han Chinese emperor ከም እስካብ ዛሕዚ ካልእ emanation ካብ .'Manjusri
translated_question: ከም ናብ Patricia Ann ,Berger እንታይ ኔሩ እቲ Yongle Emperor attempting ናብ resurrect ብ courting እና granting titles ናብ ?lamas
translated_mc_answer1: እቲ ወተሃደራዊ ኣገልግሎት conquests ካብ እቲ Yuan dynasty
translated_mc_answer2: እቲ ቁጠባዊ ties አብ መንጎ China እና Tibet
translated_mc_answer3: እቲ ርክብ አብ መንጎ China እና Tibet ዝተመስረተ ብ Khubilai Khan እና ናቱ guru Phagpa
translated_mc_answer4: እቲ political ቅርፂ ካብ እቲ Qing dynasty

passage: With the example of the Ming court's relationship with the fifth Karmapa and other Tibetan leaders, Norbu states that Chinese Communist historians have failed to realize the significance of the religious aspect of the Ming-Tibetan relationship. He writes that the meetings of lamas with the Emperor of China were exchanges of tribute between 'the patron and the priest' and were not merely instances of a political subordinate paying tribute to a superior. He also notes that the items of tribute were Buddhist artifacts which symbolized 'the religious nature of the relationship.' Josef Kolmaš writes that the Ming dynasty did not exercise any direct political control over Tibet, content with their tribute relations that were 'almost entirely of a religious character.' Patricia Ann Berger writes that the Yongle Emperor's courting and granting of titles to lamas was his attempt to 'resurrect the relationship between China and Tibet established earlier by the Yuan dynastic founder Khubilai Khan and his guru Phagpa.' She also writes that the later Qing emperors and their Mongol associates viewed the Yongle Emperor's relationship with Tibet as 'part of a chain of reincarnation that saw this Han Chinese emperor as yet another emanation of Manjusri.'
question: How did later Qing emperors and their Mongol associates view the Yongle Emperor's relationship with Tibet?
mc_answer2: As a chain of reincarnation linking him to Manjusri

translated_question: ከመይ ግቡር ዳሕራይ Qing emperors እና ናቶም Mongol associates ኣረኣእያ እቲ Yongle 'Emperor's ርክብ ምስ ?Tibet

passage: With the example of the Ming court's relationship with the fifth Karmapa and other Tibetan leaders, Norbu states that Chinese Communist historians have failed to realize the significance of the religious aspect of the Ming-Tibetan relationship. He writes that the meetings of lamas with the Emperor of China were exchanges of tribute between 'the patron and the priest' and were not merely instances of a political subordinate paying tribute to a superior. He also notes that the items of tribute were Buddhist artifacts which symbolized 'the religious nature of the relationship.' Josef Kolmaš writes that the Ming dynasty did not exercise any direct political control over Tibet, content with their tribute relations that were 'almost entirely of a religious character.' Patricia Ann Berger writes that the Yongle Emperor's courting and granting of titles to lamas was his attempt to 'resurrect the relationship between China and Tibet established earlier by the Yuan dynastic founder Khubilai Khan and his guru Phagpa.' She also writes that the later Qing emperors and their Mongol associates viewed the Yongle Emperor's relationship with Tibet as 'part of a chain of reincarnation that saw this Han Chinese emperor as yet another emanation of Manjusri.'
question: What does Josef Kolmaš imply about the nature of Ming-Tibetan tribute relations?
mc_answer1: They were mainly about military support
mc_answer2: They were almost entirely of a religious character
mc_answer3: They were solely for economic gain
mc_answer4: They were forced upon Tibet by the Ming

passage: Patricia Ebrey writes that Tibet, like Joseon Korea and other neighboring states to the Ming, settled for its tributary status while there were no troops or governors of Ming China stationed in its territory. Laird writes that 'after the Mongol troops left Tibet, no Ming troops replaced them.' Wang and Nyima state that, despite the fact that the Ming refrained from sending troops to subdue Tibet and refrained from garrisoning Ming troops there, these measures were unnecessary so long as the Ming court upheld close ties with Tibetan vassals and their forces. However, there were instances in the 14th century when the Hongwu Emperor did use military force to quell unrest in Tibet. John D. Langlois writes that there was unrest in Tibet and western Sichuan, which the Marquis Mu Ying (沐英) was commissioned to quell in November 1378 after he established a Taozhou garrison in Gansu. Langlois notes that by October 1379, Mu Ying had allegedly captured 30,000 Tibetan prisoners and 200,000 domesticated animals. Yet invasion went both ways; the Ming general Qu Neng, under the command of Lan Yu, was ordered to repel a Tibetan assault into Sichuan in 1390.
question: According to Patricia Ebrey, what did Tibet settle for in its relationship with the Ming?
mc_answer2: Tributary status without Ming troops or governors
translated_passage: Patricia Ebrey writes እቲ ,Tibet ምፍታው Joseon Korea እና ካልእ neighboring states ናብ እቲ ,Ming settled ን ናቱ tributary ኩነታት እስካብ ኣብቲ ኔሮም አይኮንን troops ወይ governors ካብ Ming China stationed አብ ውሽጢ ናቱ .ግዝኣት Laird writes እቲ 'ድሕሪ እቲ Mongol troops ፀጋም ,Tibet አይኮንን Ming troops replaced .'ንሶም Wang እና Nyima ግዝኣት ,እቲ ብዘየገድስ እቲ ሓቂ እቲ እቲ Ming refrained ካብ sending troops ናብ subdue Tibet እና refrained ካብ garrisoning Ming troops ,ኣብቲ እዚ ይዕቅን ኔሮም unnecessary ስለዚ ነዊሕ ከም እቲ Ming ቤት ፍርዲ upheld ዕፁው ties ምስ Tibetan vassals እና ናቶም .forces ,ዋላኳ ተኾነ ኣብቲ ኔሮም instances አብ ውሽጢ እቲ 14th ዘመን መዓዝ እቲ Hongwu Emperor ግቡር ጥቅሚ ወተሃደራዊ ኣገልግሎት ሓይሊ ናብ quell unrest አብ ውሽጢ .Tibet John .D Langlois writes እቲ ኣብቲ ኔሩ unrest አብ ውሽጢ Tibet እና western ,Sichuan አየናይ እቲ Marquis Mu Ying ()沐英 ኔሩ commissioned ናብ quell አብ ውሽጢ ሕዳር 1378 ድሕሪ ንሱ ዝተመስረተ ሓደ Taozhou garrison አብ ውሽጢ .Gansu Langlois notes እቲ ብ ጥቅምቲ ,1379 Mu Ying ዝነበረ allegedly captured ,30,000 Tibetan prisoners እና ,200,000 domesticated .animals እስካብ ዛሕዚ invasion ኬዱ ክልቲኡ ;ways እቲ Ming ሓፈሻዊ Qu ,Neng ትሕቲ እቲ ትእዛዝ ካብ Lan ,Yu ኔሩ ordered ናብ repel ሓደ Tibetan ጥቕዓት ናብ ውሽጢ Sichuan አብ ውሽጢ .1390
translated_question: ከም ናብ Patricia ,Ebrey እንታይ ግቡር Tibet ተስማዕመዐ ን አብ ውሽጢ ናቱ ርክብ ምስ እቲ ?Ming
translated_mc_answer2: Tributary ኩነታት ብዘይካ Ming troops ወይ governors

passage: Patricia Ebrey writes that Tibet, like Joseon Korea and other neighboring states to the Ming, settled for its tributary status while there were no troops or governors of Ming China stationed in its territory. Laird writes that 'after the Mongol troops left Tibet, no Ming troops replaced them.' Wang and Nyima state that, despite the fact that the Ming refrained from sending troops to subdue Tibet and refrained from garrisoning Ming troops there, these measures were unnecessary so long as the Ming court upheld close ties with Tibetan vassals and their forces. However, there were instances in the 14th century when the Hongwu Emperor did use military force to quell unrest in Tibet. John D. Langlois writes that there was unrest in Tibet and western Sichuan, which the Marquis Mu Ying (沐英) was commissioned to quell in November 1378 after he established a Taozhou garrison in Gansu. Langlois notes that by October 1379, Mu Ying had allegedly captured 30,000 Tibetan prisoners and 200,000 domesticated animals. Yet invasion went both ways; the Ming general Qu Neng, under the command of Lan Yu, was ordered to repel a Tibetan assault into Sichuan in 1390.
question: What does Laird note happened after the Mongol troops left Tibet?
mc_answer1: Ming China immediately garrisoned the area
mc_answer2: No Ming troops replaced the Mongol troops
mc_answer4: Tibet was annexed by the Ming

translated_question: እንታይ ምግባር Laird መዝገብ ተፈጢሩ ድሕሪ እቲ Mongol troops ፀጋም ?Tibet
translated_mc_answer1: Ming China ብቀጥታ garrisoned እቲ ስፍሓት
translated_mc_answer2: አይኮንን Ming troops replaced እቲ Mongol troops
translated_mc_answer4: Tibet ኔሩ annexed ብ እቲ Ming

translated_question: መን ኔሩ commissioned ናብ quell unrest አብ ውሽጢ Tibet እና western Sichuan አብ ውሽጢ ሕዳር ?1378

passage: Patricia Ebrey writes that Tibet, like Joseon Korea and other neighboring states to the Ming, settled for its tributary status while there were no troops or governors of Ming China stationed in its territory. Laird writes that 'after the Mongol troops left Tibet, no Ming troops replaced them.' Wang and Nyima state that, despite the fact that the Ming refrained from sending troops to subdue Tibet and refrained from garrisoning Ming troops there, these measures were unnecessary so long as the Ming court upheld close ties with Tibetan vassals and their forces. However, there were instances in the 14th century when the Hongwu Emperor did use military force to quell unrest in Tibet. John D. Langlois writes that there was unrest in Tibet and western Sichuan, which the Marquis Mu Ying (沐英) was commissioned to quell in November 1378 after he established a Taozhou garrison in Gansu. Langlois notes that by October 1379, Mu Ying had allegedly captured 30,000 Tibetan prisoners and 200,000 domesticated animals. Yet invasion went both ways; the Ming general Qu Neng, under the command of Lan Yu, was ordered to repel a Tibetan assault into Sichuan in 1390.
question: By October 1379, what did Mu Ying allegedly capture?

passage: The Association for Asian Studies states that there is no known written evidence to suggest that later leaders of the Gelug—Gendün Drup (1391–1474) and Gendün Gyatso (1475–1571)—had any contacts with Ming China. These two religious leaders were preoccupied with an overriding concern for dealing with the powerful secular Rinpungpa princes, who were patrons and protectors of the Karma Kargyu lamas. The Rinpungpa leaders were relatives of the Phagmodrupa, yet their authority shifted over time from simple governors to rulers in their own right over large areas of Ü-Tsang. The prince of Rinbung occupied Lhasa in 1498 and excluded the Gelug from attending New Years ceremonies and prayers, the most important event in the Gelug. While the task of New Years prayers in Lhasa was granted to the Karmapa and others, Gendün Gyatso traveled in exile looking for allies. However, it was not until 1518 that the secular Phagmodru ruler captured Lhasa from the Rinbung, and thereafter the Gelug was given rights to conduct the New Years prayer. When the Drikung Kagyu abbot of Drigung Monastery threatened Lhasa in 1537, Gendün Gyatso was forced to abandon the Drepung Monastery, although he eventually returned.
question: According to the Association for Asian Studies, what is known about contacts between later Gelug leaders (Gendün Drup and Gendün Gyatso) and Ming China?
mc_answer2: There is no known written evidence to suggest that they had any contacts
mc_answer3: They were vassals of Ming China
mc_answer4: They engaged in extensive trade relations
translated_passage: እቲ ማሕበር ን Asian Studies states እቲ ኣብቲ እዩ አይኮንን ፍሉጥ ዝተፀሓፈ ማስረጃ ናብ ሓሳብ ምቕራብ እቲ ዳሕራይ leaders ካብ እቲ Gelug—Gendün Drup ()1391–1474 እና Gendün Gyatso ()1475–1571)—had ዝኾነ contacts ምስ Ming .China እዚ ክልተ ሃይማኖታዊ leaders ኔሮም preoccupied ምስ ሓደ overriding ስግኣት ን dealing ምስ እቲ ሓያል secular Rinpungpa ,princes መን ኔሮም patrons እና protectors ካብ እቲ Karma Kargyu .lamas እቲ Rinpungpa leaders ኔሮም ዘመዳት ካብ እቲ ,Phagmodrupa እስካብ ዛሕዚ ናቶም ምምሕዳር shifted ልዕሊ ግዜ ካብ ቀሊል governors ናብ rulers አብ ውሽጢ ናቶም ወንን ትኽክል ልዕሊ ገዚፍ areas ካብ -.Ü-Tsang እቲ prince ካብ Rinbung ብስራሕ ትሑዝ Lhasa አብ ውሽጢ 1498 እና excluded እቲ Gelug ካብ attending ሓድሽ ዓመታት ceremonies እና ,prayers እቲ ብጥዕሚ ጠቃሚ ዝግጅት አብ ውሽጢ እቲ .Gelug እስካብ እቲ ዕዮ ካብ ሓድሽ ዓመታት prayers አብ ውሽጢ Lhasa ኔሩ ተዋሂቡ ናብ እቲ Karmapa እና ,others Gendün Gyatso traveled አብ ውሽጢ exile looking ን .allies ,ዋላኳ ተኾነ እቲ ነገር ኔሩ ዘይኮነ ክሳብ 1518 እቲ እቲ secular Phagmodru መስመርያ captured Lhasa ካብ እቲ ,Rinbung እና thereafter እቲ Gelug ኔሩ ዝተወሃበ rights ናብ ኣግባብ እቲ ሓድሽ ዓመታት .prayer መዓዝ እቲ Drikung Kagyu abbot ካብ Drigung Monastery threatened Lhasa አብ ውሽጢ ,1537 Gendün Gyatso ኔሩ forced ናብ ኣቋረፀ እቲ Drepung ,Monastery ዋላ እኳ ንሱ ብኽይዲ .returned

passage: The Association for Asian Studies states that there is no known written evidence to suggest that later leaders of the Gelug—Gendün Drup (1391–1474) and Gendün Gyatso (1475–1571)—had any contacts with Ming China. These two religious leaders were preoccupied with an overriding concern for dealing with the powerful secular Rinpungpa princes, who were patrons and protectors of the Karma Kargyu lamas. The Rinpungpa leaders were relatives of the Phagmodrupa, yet their authority shifted over time from simple governors to rulers in their own right over large areas of Ü-Tsang. The prince of Rinbung occupied Lhasa in 1498 and excluded the Gelug from attending New Years ceremonies and prayers, the most important event in the Gelug. While the task of New Years prayers in Lhasa was granted to the Karmapa and others, Gendün Gyatso traveled in exile looking for allies. However, it was not until 1518 that the secular Phagmodru ruler captured Lhasa from the Rinbung, and thereafter the Gelug was given rights to conduct the New Years prayer. When the Drikung Kagyu abbot of Drigung Monastery threatened Lhasa in 1537, Gendün Gyatso was forced to abandon the Drepung Monastery, although he eventually returned.
question: What were Gendün Drup and Gendün Gyatso primarily preoccupied with?
mc_answer2: Dealing with powerful secular Rinpungpa princes

While the task of New Years prayers in Lhasa was granted to the Karmapa and others, Gendün Gyatso traveled in exile looking for allies. However, it was not until 1518 that the secular Phagmodru ruler captured Lhasa from the Rinbung, and thereafter the Gelug was given rights to conduct the New Years prayer. When the Drikung Kagyu abbot of Drigung Monastery threatened Lhasa in 1537, Gendün Gyatso was forced to abandon the Drepung Monastery, although he eventually returned.
question: How did Gendün Gyatso respond to being excluded from New Years ceremonies in Lhasa?

passage: Sonam Gyatso, after being granted the grandiose title by Altan Khan, departed for Tibet. Before he left, he sent a letter and gifts to the Ming Chinese official Zhang Juzheng (1525–1582), which arrived on March 12, 1579. Sometime in August or September of that year, Sonam Gyatso's representative stationed with Altan Khan received a return letter and gift from the Wanli Emperor (r. 1572–1620), who also conferred upon Sonam Gyatso a title; this was the first official contact between a Dalai Lama and a government of China. However, Laird states that when Wanli invited him to Beijing, the Dalai Lama declined the offer due to a prior commitment, even though he was only 400 km (250 mi) from Beijing. Laird adds that 'the power of the Ming emperor did not reach very far at the time.' Although not recorded in any official Chinese records, Sonam Gyatso's biography states that Wanli again conferred titles on Sonam Gyatso in 1588, and invited him to Beijing for a second time, but Sonam Gyatso was unable to visit China as he died the same year in Mongolia working with Altan Khan's son to further the spread of Buddhism.
question: What did Sonam Gyatso do after being granted his grandiose title by Altan Khan?
translated_passage: Sonam ,Gyatso ድሕሪ ፍጥረት ተዋሂቡ እቲ grandiose ርእሲ ብ Altan ,Khan departed ን .Tibet ቅድሚ ንሱ ,ፀጋም ንሱ ተላኢኹ ሓደ ደብዳበ እና gifts ናብ እቲ Ming Chinese ዘፍለጠ Zhang Juzheng (),1525–1582 አየናይ በፂሑ አብ ልዕሊ መጋቢት ,12 .1579 Sometime አብ ውሽጢ ነሓሰ ወይ መስከረም ካብ እቲ ,ዓመት Sonam 'Gyatso's representative stationed ምስ Altan Khan ዝተቀበለ ሓደ ተመለስ ደብዳበ እና ውህብቶ ካብ እቲ Wanli Emperor (.r ),1572–1620 መን እውን conferred ኣብ ግዘ Sonam Gyatso ሓደ ;ርእሲ እዚ ኔሩ እቲ መጀመርታ ዘፍለጠ መርከቢ አብ መንጎ ሓደ Dalai Lama እና ሓደ መንግስቲ ካብ .China ,ዋላኳ ተኾነ Laird states እቲ መዓዝ Wanli invited ንሱ ናብ ,Beijing እቲ Dalai Lama declined እቲ ውህብቶ መወዳእታ ናብ ሓደ ቅድሚያ ,ግዱስነት ሙሉእ እኳ ንሱ ኔሩ ጥራሕ 400 km (250 )mi ካብ .Beijing Laird adds እቲ 'እቲ ሓይሊ ካብ እቲ Ming emperor ግቡር ዘይኮነ ብፅሕ ብጣዕሚ ርሑቅ ኣብ እቲ .'ግዜ ዋላ እኳ ዘይኮነ recorded አብ ውሽጢ ዝኾነ ዘፍለጠ Chinese ,records Sonam 'Gyatso's biography states እቲ Wanli ካልኣይ conferred titles አብ ልዕሊ Sonam Gyatso አብ ውሽጢ ,1588 እና invited ንሱ ናብ Beijing ን ሓደ ካልኣይ ,ግዜ ግን Sonam Gyatso ኔሩ ኣይከኣልን እዩ ናብ ጎብንይ China ከም ንሱ ሞይቱ እቲ ማዕረ ዓመት አብ ውሽጢ Mongolia ምስራሕ ምስ Altan 'Khan's son ናብ ርሑቅ እቲ ምዝርጋሕ ካብ .Buddhism

translated_passage: Sonam ,Gyatso ድሕሪ ፍጥረት ተዋሂቡ እቲ grandiose ርእሲ ብ Altan ,Khan departed ን .Tibet ቅድሚ ንሱ ,ፀጋም ንሱ ተላኢኹ ሓደ ደብዳበ እና gifts ናብ እቲ Ming Chinese ዘፍለጠ Zhang Juzheng (),1525–1582 አየናይ በፂሑ አብ ልዕሊ መጋቢት ,12 .1579 Sometime አብ ውሽጢ ነሓሰ ወይ መስከረም ካብ እቲ ,ዓመት Sonam 'Gyatso's representative stationed ምስ Altan Khan ዝተቀበለ ሓደ ተመለስ ደብዳበ እና ውህብቶ ካብ እቲ Wanli Emperor (.r ),1572–1620 መን እውን conferred ኣብ ግዘ Sonam Gyatso ሓደ ;ርእሲ እዚ ኔሩ እቲ መጀመርታ ዘፍለጠ መርከቢ አብ መንጎ ሓደ Dalai Lama እና ሓደ መንግስቲ ካብ .China ,ዋላኳ ተኾነ Laird states እቲ መዓዝ Wanli invited ንሱ ናብ ,Beijing እቲ Dalai Lama declined እቲ ውህብቶ መወዳእታ ናብ ሓደ ቅድሚያ ,ግዱስነት ሙሉእ እኳ ንሱ ኔሩ ጥራሕ 400 km (250 )mi ካብ .Beijing Laird adds እቲ 'እቲ ሓይሊ ካብ እቲ Ming emperor ግቡር ዘይኮነ ብፅሕ ብጣዕሚ ርሑቅ ኣብ እቲ .'ግዜ ዋላ እኳ ዘይኮነ recorded አብ ውሽጢ ዝኾነ ዘፍለጠ Chinese ,records Sonam 'Gyatso's biography states እቲ Wanli ካልኣይ conferred titles አብ ልዕሊ Sonam Gyatso አብ ውሽጢ ,1588 እና invited ንሱ ናብ Beijing ን ሓደ ካልኣይ ,ግዜ ግን Sonam Gyatso ኔሩ ኣይከኣልን እዩ ናብ ጎብንይ China ከም ንሱ ሞይቱ እቲ ማዕረ ዓመት አብ ውሽጢ Mongolia ምስራሕ ምስ Altan 'Khan's son ናብ ርሑቅ እቲ ምዝርጋሕ ካብ .Buddhism

passage: Sonam Gyatso, after being granted the grandiose title by Altan Khan, departed for Tibet. Before he left, he sent a letter and gifts to the Ming Chinese official Zhang Juzheng (1525–1582), which arrived on March 12, 1579. Sometime in August or September of that year, Sonam Gyatso's representative stationed with Altan Khan received a return letter and gift from the Wanli Emperor (r. 1572–1620), who also conferred upon Sonam Gyatso a title; this was the first official contact between a Dalai Lama and a government of China. However, Laird states that when Wanli invited him to Beijing, the Dalai Lama declined the offer due to a prior commitment, even though he was only 400 km (250 mi) from Beijing. Laird adds that 'the power of the Ming emperor did not reach very far at the time.' Although not recorded in any official Chinese records, Sonam Gyatso's biography states that Wanli again conferred titles on Sonam Gyatso in 1588, and invited him to Beijing for a second time, but Sonam Gyatso was unable to visit China as he died the same year in Mongolia working with Altan Khan's son to further the spread of Buddhism.

question: According to Laird, why did the Dalai Lama decline the invitation to Beijing?
mc_answer4: He did not trust the emperor
translated_passage: Sonam ,Gyatso ድሕሪ ፍጥረት ተዋሂቡ እቲ grandiose ርእሲ ብ Altan ,Khan departed ን .Tibet ቅድሚ ንሱ ,ፀጋም ንሱ ተላኢኹ ሓደ ደብዳበ እና gifts ናብ እቲ Ming Chinese ዘፍለጠ Zhang Juzheng (),1525–1582 አየናይ በፂሑ አብ ልዕሊ መጋቢት ,12 .1579 Sometime አብ ውሽጢ ነሓሰ ወይ መስከረም ካብ እቲ ,ዓመት Sonam 'Gyatso's representative stationed ምስ Altan Khan ዝተቀበለ ሓደ ተመለስ ደብዳበ እና ውህብቶ ካብ እቲ Wanli Emperor (.r ),1572–1620 መን እውን conferred ኣብ ግዘ Sonam Gyatso ሓደ ;ርእሲ እዚ ኔሩ እቲ መጀመርታ ዘፍለጠ መርከቢ አብ መንጎ ሓደ Dalai Lama እና ሓደ መንግስቲ ካብ .China ,ዋላኳ ተኾነ Laird states እቲ መዓዝ Wanli invited ንሱ ናብ ,Beijing እቲ Dalai Lama declined እቲ ውህብቶ መወዳእታ ናብ ሓደ ቅድሚያ ,ግዱስነት ሙሉእ እኳ ንሱ ኔሩ ጥራሕ 400 km (250 )mi ካብ .Beijing Laird adds እቲ 'እቲ ሓይሊ ካብ እቲ Ming emperor ግቡር ዘይኮነ ብፅሕ ብጣዕሚ ርሑቅ ኣብ እቲ .'ግዜ ዋላ እኳ ዘይኮነ recorded አብ ውሽጢ ዝኾነ ዘፍለጠ Chinese ,records Sonam 'Gyatso's biography states እቲ Wanli ካልኣይ conferred titles አብ ልዕሊ Sonam Gyatso አብ ውሽጢ ,1588 እና invited ንሱ ናብ Beijing ን ሓደ ካልኣይ ,ግዜ ግን Sonam Gyatso ኔሩ ኣይከኣልን እዩ ናብ ጎብንይ China ከም ንሱ ሞይቱ እቲ ማዕረ ዓመት አብ ውሽጢ Mongolia ምስራሕ ምስ Altan 'Khan's son ናብ ርሑቅ እቲ ምዝርጋሕ ካብ .Buddhism
translated_question: ከም ናብ ,Laird ንምንታይ ግቡር እቲ Dalai Lama ኣውድቅ እቲ ዕድመ ናብ ?Beijing
translated_mc_answer4: ንሱ ግቡር ዘይኮነ እምነት እቲ emperor

passage: Sonam Gyatso, after being granted the grandiose title by Altan Khan, departed for Tibet. Before he left, he sent a letter and gifts to the Ming Chinese official Zhang Juzheng (1525–1582), which arrived on March 12, 1579. Sometime in August or September of that year, Sonam Gyatso's representative stationed with Altan Khan received a return letter and gift from the Wanli Emperor (r. 1572–1620), who also conferred upon Sonam Gyatso a title; this was the first official contact between a Dalai Lama and a government of China. However, Laird states that when Wanli invited him to Beijing, the Dalai Lama declined the offer due to a prior commitment, even though he was only 400 km (250 mi) from Beijing. Laird adds that 'the power of the Ming emperor did not reach very far at the time.' Although not recorded in any official Chinese records, Sonam Gyatso's biography states that Wanli again conferred titles on Sonam Gyatso in 1588, and invited him to Beijing for a second time, but Sonam Gyatso was unable to visit China as he died the same year in Mongolia working with Altan Khan's son to further the spread of Buddhism.
question: Approximately how far was the Dalai Lama from Beijing when invited, according to the passage?

translated_passage: Sonam ,Gyatso ድሕሪ ፍጥረት ተዋሂቡ እቲ grandiose ርእሲ ብ Altan ,Khan departed ን .Tibet ቅድሚ ንሱ ,ፀጋም ንሱ ተላኢኹ ሓደ ደብዳበ እና gifts ናብ እቲ Ming Chinese ዘፍለጠ Zhang Juzheng (),1525–1582 አየናይ በፂሑ አብ ልዕሊ መጋቢት ,12 .1579 Sometime አብ ውሽጢ ነሓሰ ወይ መስከረም ካብ እቲ ,ዓመት Sonam 'Gyatso's representative stationed ምስ Altan Khan ዝተቀበለ ሓደ ተመለስ ደብዳበ እና ውህብቶ ካብ እቲ Wanli Emperor (.r ),1572–1620 መን እውን conferred ኣብ ግዘ Sonam Gyatso ሓደ ;ርእሲ እዚ ኔሩ እቲ መጀመርታ ዘፍለጠ መርከቢ አብ መንጎ ሓደ Dalai Lama እና ሓደ መንግስቲ ካብ .China ,ዋላኳ ተኾነ Laird states እቲ መዓዝ Wanli invited ንሱ ናብ ,Beijing እቲ Dalai Lama declined እቲ ውህብቶ መወዳእታ ናብ ሓደ ቅድሚያ ,ግዱስነት ሙሉእ እኳ ንሱ ኔሩ ጥራሕ 400 km (250 )mi ካብ .Beijing Laird adds እቲ 'እቲ ሓይሊ ካብ እቲ Ming emperor ግቡር ዘይኮነ ብፅሕ ብጣዕሚ ርሑቅ ኣብ እቲ .'ግዜ ዋላ እኳ ዘይኮነ recorded አብ ውሽጢ ዝኾነ ዘፍለጠ Chinese ,records Sonam 'Gyatso's biography states እቲ Wanli ካልኣይ conferred titles አብ ልዕሊ Sonam Gyatso አብ ውሽጢ ,1588 እና invited ንሱ ናብ Beijing ን ሓደ ካልኣይ ,ግዜ ግን Sonam Gyatso ኔሩ ኣይከኣልን እዩ ናብ ጎብንይ China ከም ንሱ ሞይቱ እቲ ማዕረ ዓመት አብ ውሽጢ Mongolia ምስራሕ ምስ Altan 'Khan's son ናብ ርሑቅ እቲ ምዝርጋሕ ካብ .Buddhism

translated_mc_answer2: ንሱ ኔሩ prevented ብ Ming officials
translated_mc_answer3: ንሱ ሞይቱ አብ ውሽጢ Mongolia ምስራሕ ምስ Altan 'Khan's son ናብ ርሑቅ እቲ ምዝርጋሕ ካብ Buddhism

passage: In 1565, the powerful Rinbung princes were overthrown by one of their own ministers, Karma Tseten who styled himself as the Tsangpa, 'the one of Tsang', and established his base of power at Shigatse. The second successor of this first Tsang king, Karma Phuntsok Namgyal, took control of the whole of Central Tibet (Ü-Tsang), reigning from 1611–1621. Despite this, the leaders of Lhasa still claimed their allegiance to the Phagmodru as well as the Gelug, while the Ü-Tsang king allied with the Karmapa. Tensions rose between the nationalistic Ü-Tsang ruler and the Mongols who safeguarded their Mongol Dalai Lama in Lhasa. The fourth Dalai Lama refused to give an audience to the Ü-Tsang king, which sparked a conflict as the latter began assaulting Gelug monasteries. Chen writes of the speculation over the fourth Dalai Lama's mysterious death and the plot of the Ü-Tsang king to have him murdered for 'cursing' him with illness, although Chen writes that the murder was most likely the result of a feudal power struggle. In 1618, only two years after Yonten Gyatso died, the Gelug and the Karma Kargyu went to war, the Karma Kargyu supported by the secular Ü-Tsang king. The Ü-Tsang ruler had a large number of Gelugpa lamas killed, occupied their monasteries at Drepung and Sera, and outlawed any attempts to find another Dalai Lama. In 1621, the Ü-Tsang king died and was succeeded by his young son Karma Tenkyong, an event which stymied the war effort as the latter accepted the six-year-old Lozang Gyatso as the new Dalai Lama. Despite the new Dalai Lama's diplomatic efforts to maintain friendly relations with the new Ü-Tsang ruler, Sonam Rapten (1595–1657), the Dalai Lama's chief steward and treasurer at Drepung, made efforts to overthrow the Ü-Tsang king, which led to another conflict. In 1633, the Gelugpas and several thousand Mongol adherents defeated the Ü-Tsang king's troops near Lhasa before a peaceful negotiation was settled. Goldstein writes that in this the 'Mongols were again playing a significant role in Tibetan affairs, this time as the military arm of the Dalai Lama.'
question: In what year were the Rinbung princes overthrown by Karma Tseten?
translated_passage: አብ ውሽጢ ,1565 እቲ ሓያል Rinbung princes ኔሮም overthrown ብ ሓደ ካብ ናቶም ወንን ,ministers Karma Tseten መን styled himself ከም እቲ ,Tsangpa 'እቲ ሓደ ካብ ',Tsang እና ዝተመስረተ ናቱ መሰረት ካብ ሓይሊ ኣብ .Shigatse እቲ ካልኣይ successor ካብ እዚ መጀመርታ Tsang ,ንጉስ Karma Phuntsok ,Namgyal ምውሳድ ምቁጽጻር ካብ እቲ ሙሉእ ካብ Central Tibet (-),Ü-Tsang reigning ካብ .1611–1621 ብዘየገድስ ,እዚ እቲ leaders ካብ Lhasa እስካብ ሕዚ claimed ናቶም allegiance ናብ እቲ Phagmodru ከም ደሓን ከም እቲ ,Gelug እስካብ እቲ -Ü-Tsang ንጉስ allied ምስ እቲ .Karmapa Tensions rose አብ መንጎ እቲ nationalistic -Ü-Tsang መስመርያ እና እቲ Mongols መን safeguarded ናቶም Mongol Dalai Lama አብ ውሽጢ .Lhasa እቲ fourth Dalai Lama ዝተኸለአ ናብ ሃብ ሓደ ተመልካቲ ናብ እቲ -Ü-Tsang ,ንጉስ አየናይ sparked ሓደ ባእሲ ከም እቲ ጸኒሑ ጀሚሩ assaulting Gelug .monasteries Chen writes ካብ እቲ speculation ልዕሊ እቲ fourth Dalai 'Lama's ምስጢራዊ ሞት እና እቲ ንድፊ ካብ እቲ -Ü-Tsang ንጉስ ናብ ኣለኒ ንሱ murdered ን ''cursing ንሱ ምስ ,ሕማም ዋላ እኳ Chen writes እቲ እቲ murder ኔሩ ብጥዕሚ ምናልባት እቲ ውፅኢት ካብ ሓደ feudal ሓይሊ .ገልታዕታዕ አብ ውሽጢ ,1618 ጥራሕ ክልተ ዓመታት ድሕሪ Yonten Gyatso ,ሞይቱ እቲ Gelug እና እቲ Karma Kargyu ኬዱ ናብ ,ውግእ እቲ Karma Kargyu supported ብ እቲ secular -Ü-Tsang .ንጉስ እቲ -Ü-Tsang መስመርያ ዝነበረ ሓደ ገዚፍ ቑጽሪ ካብ Gelugpa lamas ,killed ብስራሕ ትሑዝ ናቶም monasteries ኣብ Drepung እና ,Sera እና outlawed ዝኾነ attempts ናብ ርኸብ ካልእ Dalai .Lama አብ ውሽጢ ,1621 እቲ -Ü-Tsang ንጉስ ሞይቱ እና ኔሩ succeeded ብ ናቱ ንእሽተይ son Karma ,Tenkyong ሓደ ዝግጅት አየናይ stymied እቲ ውግእ ፃዕሪ ከም እቲ ጸኒሑ accepted እቲ --six-year-old Lozang Gyatso ከም እቲ ሓድሽ Dalai .Lama ብዘየገድስ እቲ ሓድሽ Dalai 'Lama's diplomatic efforts ናብ ምዕቃብ ምቕሉል relations ምስ እቲ ሓድሽ -Ü-Tsang ,መስመርያ Sonam Rapten (),1595–1657 እቲ Dalai 'Lama's ሓለቓ steward እና treasurer ኣብ ,Drepung ዝተሰርሐ efforts ናብ overthrow እቲ -Ü-Tsang ,ንጉስ አየናይ መረሐ ናብ ካልእ .ባእሲ አብ ውሽጢ ,1633 እቲ Gelugpas እና ቡዙሓት ሽሕ Mongol adherents defeated እቲ -Ü-Tsang 'king's troops ጥቃ Lhasa ቅድሚ ሓደ ሰለማዊ negotiation ኔሩ .settled Goldstein writes እቲ አብ ውሽጢ እዚ እቲ 'Mongols ኔሮም ካልኣይ ምፅዋት ሓደ ግዙፍ ግደ አብ ውሽጢ Tibetan ,affairs እዚ ግዜ ከም እቲ ወተሃደራዊ ኣገልግሎት ኢድ ካብ እቲ Dalai .'Lama

The Ü-Tsang ruler had a large number of Gelugpa lamas killed, occupied their monasteries at Drepung and Sera, and outlawed any attempts to find another Dalai Lama. In 1621, the Ü-Tsang king died and was succeeded by his young son Karma Tenkyong, an event which stymied the war effort as the latter accepted the six-year-old Lozang Gyatso as the new Dalai Lama. Despite the new Dalai Lama's diplomatic efforts to maintain friendly relations with the new Ü-Tsang ruler, Sonam Rapten (1595–1657), the Dalai Lama's chief steward and treasurer at Drepung, made efforts to overthrow the Ü-Tsang king, which led to another conflict. In 1633, the Gelugpas and several thousand Mongol adherents defeated the Ü-Tsang king's troops near Lhasa before a peaceful negotiation was settled. Goldstein writes that in this the 'Mongols were again playing a significant role in Tibetan affairs, this time as the military arm of the Dalai Lama.'

passage: In 1565, the powerful Rinbung princes were overthrown by one of their own ministers, Karma Tseten who styled himself as the Tsangpa, 'the one of Tsang', and established his base of power at Shigatse. The second successor of this first Tsang king, Karma Phuntsok Namgyal, took control of the whole of Central Tibet (Ü-Tsang), reigning from 1611–1621. Despite this, the leaders of Lhasa still claimed their allegiance to the Phagmodru as well as the Gelug, while the Ü-Tsang king allied with the Karmapa. Tensions rose between the nationalistic Ü-Tsang ruler and the Mongols who safeguarded their Mongol Dalai Lama in Lhasa. The fourth Dalai Lama refused to give an audience to the Ü-Tsang king, which sparked a conflict as the latter began assaulting Gelug monasteries. Chen writes of the speculation over the fourth Dalai Lama's mysterious death and the plot of the Ü-Tsang king to have him murdered for 'cursing' him with illness, although Chen writes that the murder was most likely the result of a feudal power struggle. In 1618, only two years after Yonten Gyatso died, the Gelug and the Karma Kargyu went to war, the Karma Kargyu supported by the secular Ü-Tsang king. The Ü-Tsang ruler had a large number of Gelugpa lamas killed, occupied their monasteries at Drepung and Sera, and outlawed any attempts to find another Dalai Lama. In 1621, the Ü-Tsang king died and was succeeded by his young son Karma Tenkyong, an event which stymied the war effort as the latter accepted the six-year-old Lozang Gyatso as the new Dalai Lama. Despite the new Dalai Lama's diplomatic efforts to maintain friendly relations with the new Ü-Tsang ruler, Sonam Rapten (1595–1657), the Dalai Lama's chief steward and treasurer at Drepung, made efforts to overthrow the Ü-Tsang king, which led to another conflict. In 1633, the Gelugpas and several thousand Mongol adherents defeated the Ü-Tsang king's troops near Lhasa before a peaceful negotiation was settled. Goldstein writes that in this the 'Mongols were again playing a significant role in Tibetan affairs, this time as the military arm of the Dalai Lama.'
